apps.title: BookMyShow | Movies & Events
apps.description:
Your access to all things entertainment is here!

From epic concerts and the latest blockbusters to thrilling sports, theatre, and everything LIVE, it’s all on BookMyShow. And if you live for unforgettable experiences, this app deserves a front-row spot on your phone!

No matter what mood you’re in, there’s something for everyone. Whether you’re looking for the most amazing big-screen experience for the latest releases, or you want to step out with the gang for the most happening gigs in town, we’ve got it all. Oh, and did we mention that there are plenty of things to do for quality family time, too? From amusement parks to fun activities for kids of all ages, BookMyShow truly has it ALL.

This year looks LIT with entertainment, thanks to upcoming Indian blockbusters like Coolie, Retro, Raid 2, HIT: The 3rd Case, Thug Life as well as Hollywood releases like Thunderbolts*, Mission Impossible – The Final Reckoning, and many more! Enjoy these movies on the big screen and make the most of this experience by booking the BestSeller Seats on the BookMyShow app. You can also get exciting offers from numerous banks and wallets, and get mouth-watering Restaurant Deals that assure up to 40% off at eateries near your cinema.

BookMyShow has made going out an enriching experience with the big events in the country, like Guns N’ Roses: India 2025, Travis Scott: Circus Maximus Stadium Tour, India, Humare Ram, Papa Yaar by Zakir Khan, and Jo Bolta Hai Wahi Hota Hai feat Harsh Gujral. Browse a wide range of events in your city and stay entertained. 

That’s not all! Discover world-class entertainment, TV series, and blockbuster releases like Ab Toh Sab Bhagwan Bharose, Anora, September 5 on BookMyShow Stream - where you don’t need any subscription and can rent/buy a title whenever you want.

In summary, BookMyShow is a comprehensive online platform that allows users to discover, explore, and book tickets for a wide range of entertainment events. With its user-friendly interface, extensive event database, personalised recommendations, and secure ticketing services, BookMyShow remains the preferred choice for entertainment enthusiasts seeking seamless and memorable experiences.


At BookMyShow, we take our users' privacy seriously.
• Storage: We save some data locally to avoid making a lot of network calls.
• Your Location: We use the location data to show you venues around you. No data is saved on our servers.
• Your Social Information: We only need to read your contacts when you need to pick someone from the contacts to share the booking details. We don't save any of this data on our servers, ever.
• Your application’s information & Logs: We use this to gather the information that helps us fix issues that you may experience with our app. We do not save any of this information.
• Your Accounts: We require this to be able to send Push Notifications. Don’t worry, we never spam.
• Your Contacts: We need access to your contacts so that you can invite your friends to chat or join you after you've booked your tickets. We ask for your contact permission for a bunch of features like chat, sharing tickets with friends. Your information will be kept confidential.
• Read and Receive SMS: We need this permission to enable our app to read your One-Time-Password SMS and automatically enter the code while completing the payment. Your privacy will be respected, and no information will be saved.

Download our app for FREE and book tickets on the go. Entertainment is at your fingertips.

For more entertainment, follow us on social media!

Need help? Head to the Help Centre page on our mobile application, and we are sure you’d find answers to any queries that may cross your mind.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
We’ve made navigating the app easy-peasy for you!

Here’s how:
- Get a clear picture of booking & billing details separated for better understanding.
- See cancellation options up front on the order summary page.
- Cleaner, refined look of the information for easier decision making. 

We strive to bring you the smoothest BookMyShow experience! 
To make sure you are always using the new version, turn on updates.

apps.title: BET+
apps.description:
BET+ is a premium online streaming service with over 2,500 hours of your favorite Black content from the best Black creators. Stream Black culture; including: the movies you remember, the TV shows you love and the new series you can't live without. 

Dive into modern favorites like The Ms. Pat Show and All the Queen's Men. Then, make every day a throwback with classics like Martin, The Wayans Brothers and Tyler Perry's House of Payne. Binge exclusive originals from Black creators like Tracy Oliver's First Wives Club, Kirk Franklin's Kingdom Business and Carl Weber's The Family Business. Plus, there are movies, plays and new series from Tyler Perry that you'll only find on BET+, including new episodes of Tyler Perry's Zatima and Ruthless. Welcome to the home of Black culture! 

Check out some of the hits and exclusives:

•	The Ms. Pat Show
•	Average Joe
•	Diarra From Detroit
•	Tyler Perry's Bruh
•	Tyler Perry's Ruthless
•	Don't Tell Mom the Babysitter's Dead
•	The Ms. Pat Show
•	All the Queen's Men
•	Tyler Perry's Zatima
•	Tyler Perry's Sistas
•	Carl Weber's The Family Business
•	The Despaired
•	Incision
•	First Wives Club
•	Young. Wild. Free.
•	The Reading
•	Martin
•	The Porter
•	Bigger
•	Kingdom Business
•	Tyler Perry's Madea's Farewell: The Play


APP FEATURES:

•	With your own personalized watch list, you can save your favorites and add new movies and series to enjoy.

•	If multiple people are using BET+, there are now individualized user profiles to keep each person's favorites in one place. 

•	Enjoy Cross-Platform Continue Watching, a new feature that allows you to start watching an episode or movie on one platform, then pick up where you left off, even on a different platform.

•	Start your subscription today! Your first seven days are free, then your paid monthly BET+ subscription begins. You can avoid auto-renew charges by canceling at least 24 hours before the end of your trial or current billing period.

•	Chromecast support lets you cast your favorite shows to your TV. Just hook up your TV to your Chromecast device.

Full episode streaming is available within the U.S. only.

For help, visit www.bet.com/betplus/help or contact support@bet.plus.

Terms of Use: https://www.bet.com/betplus/terms-of-use.html

The Terms of Use for this app include arbitration for disputes -- see https://www.bet.plus/legal/aqgb7j/arbitration-faqs.

Privacy Policy: https://privacy.paramount.com/policy

Your Privacy Choices: https://privacy.paramount.com/app-donotsell

California Notice: https://privacy.paramount.com/en/policy#additional-information-us-states

raw_data.releaseNotes:
BET+ is acting brand new with new episodes of our original series, new stand-up specials and new additions to our movie collection. We're adding new goodness all the time.

And those glitches you told us about? We’re handling those, too. Check out the very latest right now!

apps.title: DIRECTV: Live TV + Streaming
apps.description:
The DIRECTV app offers TV programming in a variety of flexible streaming options, available everywhere in the U.S. From live TV channels to On Demand programming, DIRECTV gives you today's way to watch movies, shows, series, sports, news and much more. At home or on the go, it’s now easy to stream on your schedule with our flexible streaming plans.

Dive into a massive library of On Demand entertainment! Hollywood blockbusters, full seasons of your favorite series, top network shows — access to thousands of titles across every genre: drama, comedy, action, family, documentaries, and whether you want complete Spanish-language programming or a Spanish-language sports add-ons, DIRECTV has options for you.
Take your content with you, no matter where you are in the U.S.
Stream live sports, breaking news, and all the must-see TV moments on all your favorite screens. It’s the Live TV app + Live Sports app + Free Streaming TV app + Your Favorite Shows & Movies app, featuring:
●Effortless searching via a dynamic easy-to-use guide
●DIRECTV on your phone, tablet or TV with stunning picture quality
●An impressive streaming library with thousands of hit shows and movies
● Streaming local, national and regional sports channels (availability of channels varies based on package/location)
Enjoy a personalized, intuitive viewing experience.
Designed to make watching effortless with:
●Smart homepage with personalized recommendations based on your viewing habits
●Five custom profiles provide tailored content for everyone in your household
●Save & watch later with the exclusive “My Library” tab to keep track of your must-watch content
•Enjoy unlimited simultaneous streams on unlimited screens within your home (must be on the same home network and compatible device(s) required. Limit 3 concurrent out-of-home streams. Certain networks limit total number of simultaneous streams. Restr’s apply.)
Stream the premium DIRECTV experience for FREE.
MyFree DIRECTV features a curated selection of 105+ popular channels, live TV channels, movies & shows, and On Demand content. all personalized to your preferences with no contract, no credit card, no hassles. Just download the app and sign up using your email!
Try our (very) affordable Genre Packs.
Mix and match the genres you like with no annual contracts.
•MySports: 20+ sports channels including ESPN+, NFL Network, NHL Network
●MyEntertainment: 40+ channels including Disney+, Hulu Bundle Basic and Max Basic with ads
●MyNews: 9+ news-focused channels such as CNBC, FOX News, CNN and MSNBC
●MiEspañol: 60+ channels including Univision, TUDN, Telemundo, ESPN Deportes
Cancel anytime. Local channels vary by market. Blackout restr’s apply to sports content.
Make DIRECTV your home for sports
DIRECTV carries top sports networks like ESPN and FS1, local, regional and national sports channels, and sports streaming services like ESPN+ included in select Genre Packs. DIRECTV delivers pro sports, all year long, including sports streaming, live NBA games, MLB live streaming, NHL, MLS, Tennis and much more. Our streaming Packages offer a variety of options to access your local sports teams (plus news and entertainment).  Availability varies by location and programming option selections.
Hablas Español?
DIRECTV has the ultimate Spanish-language channel lineup para todos. Whether you want complete Spanish-language programming or a Spanish-language sports add-on to watch futbol, DIRECTV has options for you. Spanish-language streaming options include ÓPTIMO MÁSTM Signature Package and MiEspañol Genre Pack! (Local channels vary by market)
Service renews monthly unless canceled. Cancel anytime. Device subject to Equipment Lease agmt. Add’l fee(s) may apply if equip. not returned. Credit card req’d. Restr’s apply. Visit www.directv.com for more details.This app features Nielsen’s proprietary measurement software which contributes to market research, like Nielsen’s TV Ratings. For more information visit: www.Nielsen.com/digitalprivacy

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

apps.title: Fandango - Get Movie Tickets
apps.description:
Download Fandango – the #1 movie ticketing app with over 2 million 5-Star Reviews! Available across iOS devices including iPhone, iPad, iMessage and Apple Watch! Buy movie tickets, watch the newest trailers, browse Rotten Tomatoes® scores, and find the best showtimes and seats for more than 31,000 screens nationwide.

• BUY MOVIE TICKETS: Get your tickets ahead of time to skip the box office line and secure the best seats to the biggest movies. Save time with mobile tickets using your iPhone’s Apple Wallet or Apple Watch for quick and easy entry.

• FREE ACCOUNT: Checkout as a Guest or sign up for free for a faster, more convenient ticketing experience. Save your favorite movies, preferred theaters, payment info, and theater rewards account information while earning Fandango VIP+ rewards with each ticket.

• GET FANDANGO & THEATER REWARDS: Earn/redeem theater loyalty points AND Fandango VIP+ loyalty points. Create a free account to get a $5 reward for every 4 tickets towards Fandango movie tickets or Vudu on demand streaming. Enjoy even more rewards by linking your favorite theater reward programs like AMC Stubs, Regal Crown Club, Cinemark Movie Rewards, and more!

• SELF-SERVICE REFUNDS & EXCHANGES: If plans change, you can easily refund or exchange your tickets before the theater’s deadline with self-service refunds.

FANDANGO APP FEATURES: 

• SEARCH TODAY’S SHOWTIMES: Use the In Theaters Today time filter to quickly scan today’s showtimes across multiple theaters for selected time ranges.

• CHECK AVAILABLE SEATS: Use Seat Map Preview to easily check seat availability for all showtimes and find the best seats before purchasing your movie tickets.

• BROWSE MOVIES: Check out the latest movies in theaters and coming soon, browse Rotten Tomatoes® scores, and be the first to know when tickets go on sale with FanAlert™ email notifications. 

• WATCH MOVIE TRAILERS: Check out the latest trailers for new and upcoming movies. Like what you see? Just one tap to find the best seats or be notified when tickets go on sale.

• BROWSE THEATERS NEAR YOU: Find nearby theaters and showtimes instantly, view all theater amenities, and save your favorite theaters for easy access.

• ASK SIRI: Set shortcuts to retrieve your movie tickets, view specific movie times, and check theater locations.

• PLAN THE PERFECT MOVIE NIGHT: Make and share movie plans with Fandango for iMessage. Easily split payments with friends and get paid back with PayPal or Venmo, no more IOUs.

Fandango’s partners are the nation’s leading exhibitors, including AMC Theatres, Regal Cinemas, Cinemark, Marcus Theatres, Harkins Theatres, and many other innovative theater chains and independent cinemas. Together, these exhibitors represent more than ninety percent of the nation's theaters with online ticketing capabilities.

apps.title: Galaxy Attack: Alien Shooter
apps.description:
Earth's last hope is in your hands, take control of the lone spaceship and protect Earth from alien swarms. Your goal will be quite challenging as you will have to save the Universe from its evil enemies. In this space shooting game, you will be facing an increasingly large number of enemies in hazardous environments. As the game progresses, you will earn the right to upgrade your spacecraft to unleash its full lethal capacity.

HOW TO PLAY:
* Touch screen to move and kill all enemies.
* Collect items to upgrade or change your weapons.

FEATURES:
* Multiplayer mode
* High quality images optimized for tablets and large screens.
* Ability to use active skills during the space battles.
* The game is packed with 140 levels on various difficulties.
* Beautiful levels with immersive missions to complete. 
* Multiple extreme boss battles. 
* Upgrade your guns and lasers.
Enjoy classic space combat - powered up. Download Galaxy Attack Space Shooter now!

apps.title: Disney Heroes: Battle Mode
apps.description:
Join the battle and collect 200+ heroes in this action Packed RPG starring Disney and Pixar Heroes from The Incredibles, Wreck-It Ralph, and Zootopia!

Welcome to the digital City... and enjoy it while you can. Pull together the best teams for the job, equip powerful gear, plus battle against incredible odds to save your fellow heroes.  It gets tougher as you go up against virus-corrupted versions of powerful Disney & Pixar characters themselves, like Eda Clawthorne, Kuzco, Mirabel Madrigal, Buzz Lightyear, Tiana and more, as you unravel who’s behind this mysterious pixelated infection! 


Only YOU can win the day! No cape required.
•  Collect & battle with 200+ Disney & Pixar heroes, including characters from Frozen, Mickey & Friends, The Incredibles, Phineas and Ferb, Pirates of the Caribbean, Toy Story, Beauty and the Beast, Alice in Wonderland, plus so many more!
•  Team up forcooperative attack missions and special strategy campaigns in this multiplayer RPG competition.
•  Upgrade your characters with epic abilities & gear.
•  Join or start a guild with your friends.
•  Participate in PvP battles in Arena and Coliseum and rise to leaderboard heights.
•  Explore a new digital world & save your fellow heroes!

You can download and play this game for free. Please note that it also allows you to play using virtual currency, which can be acquired as you progress through the game or by paying with real money. You can restrict or disable in-app purchases in your device settings. 

A network connection is required to play.

YOU MUST BE 13 YEARS OF AGE OR OLDER TO PLAY DISNEY HEROES.

Official site: https://www.disneyheroesgame.com/ 
Terms of Use and Privacy Policy: http://perblue.com/disneyheroes/terms/

apps.title: FANDOM News & Stories
apps.description:
Whether you’re into everything entertainment or want to keep up with the latest on just The Walking Dead, Fortnite or Star Wars, the FANDOM app makes it quick and easy to be in the know.

Get all the info and breaking news you care about in one place with customized fan feeds: news, wiki pages, stories, videos, social buzz, ‘Discussions,’ and in-depth knowledge via FANDOM communities.

FEATURES
- Customize your feed by choosing entertainment topics you’re passionate about, from the next Netflix sleeper hit to the upcoming Marvel movie to the hot new Xbox game and everything in between
- Never miss a beat with videos, news, reviews, original stories, social conversations and exclusives
- Go deep inside your favorite fandoms with expert information fueled by fan communities
- Join the conversation and swap fan theories with the Discussions feature
- Get notified when “OMG! moments” happen within your favorite fandoms
- Easily share articles with friends through email, Messages, Facebook, Twitter, WhatsApp, and more

Please note that news-related content is currently only available in English.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

apps.title: Acorn TV: Brilliant Hit Series
apps.description:
Acorn TV is the premier streaming service importing a collection of world-class mysteries, dramas, and thrillers from Britain, Australia, Ireland, France, and beyond – extraordinary originals, exclusive premieres, and thought-provoking hit series from around the globe, all in one place. From charmingly cozy to daringly dark, escape to whatever destinations you like, no matter your cup of tea. Acorn TV…nothing less than brilliant.

Try us free for 7 days!
 
•	Instant access to a world-class library of dramas, mysteries, comedies, documentaries, and more
•	New series and episodes added weekly, including Acorn TV Originals, so there’s always something to watch
•	Always commercial-free. Watch whenever you want, wherever you want for one low monthly price
•	Search your favorite shows and watch immediately or save to your watchlist and come back to it later
•	Sign up and stream on all your devices
 
After the 7-day trial, your Acorn TV subscription will continue at the current monthly or annual rate depending on the type of plan you select. If you subscribe via iTunes, your payment will be charged to your iTunes account. You can easily cancel anytime by turning off auto-renew in your iTunes account settings.
 
The monthly subscription automatically renews every month unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Your iTunes account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period.
The annual subscription automatically renews every year unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Your iTunes account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period.
Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription, where applicable. 

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/OfficialAcornTV/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/acorntv
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/acorn_tv/
 
Terms and Conditions: https://www.amcnetworks.com/terms-of-use
Privacy Policy: https://www.amcnetworks.com/privacy-policy
Support: http://support.acorn.tv/support/home

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

Spend more time on love and not in the lines with our features like fun card management & refill, booking bowling reservations, and Ring the Dinner Bell. apps.title: 17LIVE - Live Streaming & Chat
apps.description:
Experience the thrill of live streaming with 17LIVE! Join our vibrant community of live streamers from across the globe, where you can watch, chat, and show your support by sending digital gifts. With over 50 million downloads worldwide and thousands of live streamers that go live every day, there’s always something for you on 17LIVE!

WATCH endless amounts of live streamers perform and showcase their unique talents in individual showroom. Our platform features a variety of streamers, from world-renowned artists performing virtual concerts to everyday live streamers cooking, gaming, dancing, and just chatting (IRL). 

CHAT directly with live streamers in real-time. Interact with live streamers and viewers in the full-featured live chat. Join our close-knit community and meet new people!

SUPPORT your favorite live streamer by sending them gifts. There are hundreds of unique animated gifts to choose from. Drum up authentic reactions from live streamers in real-time when you send them digital gifts!

BUILD an authentic, personal connection with your live streamer. Unlike short-form content, watch, chat, and be a part of every live streaming moment! 

DISCOVER live streamers based on your interests and watching habits. Explore a constant stream of live entertainment from around the world, 24/7. 

GET the attention of popular live streamers with exclusive user badges and comment frames. Collect these special rewards by being a top supporter and grab the room’s attention whenever you chat in a live stream.

PARTICIPATE in weekly and monthly events with live streamers. Help streamers compete, move up the leaderboard, and win cool prizes by sending event gifts!

Come find all kinds of streamers that go live up on our app! What are you into? Tango dancer, hippo tamer, beagle owner, Bravo shows critic, nana’s recipe, broadcast, comedian, DC fanboy, pogo stick artist? Bingo! Look no further, 17Live is here for you now to kick start your day with super fun contents that make you go coco loco!

Website: https://about.17.live/

Premium Subscription: Get special offers

Pay $9.49 per month for Premium. Premium subscriptions will be charged to your app store account at confirmation of purchase. It will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active subscription period. Accounts will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal can be turned off by navigating to the user's Account Settings after purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable. For more information, please refer to our Privacy Policy and Terms of Use: http://17.media/policies/terms

apps.title: OSN+
apps.description:
OSN+ is your go-to premium destination for streaming movies, series, Hollywood movies, Arabic movies, and more across 22 countries. Explore the latest movies, series and documentaries from giants like HBO, Paramount, Universal, Discovery+ along with OSN+ Originals, and many more.

Whether you're keen on Arabic series, Turkish series, Hollywood blockbusters, DC Universe hits, or HBO Exclusives OSN+ has your entertainment appetite covered. Watch movies or watch series with Arabic dubbing and subtitling to suit your preference.

Stream movies and shows from a collection featuring over 10,000 hours of premium content tailored for every family member. With OSN+, you're not just streaming, you can immerse yourself in the content and watch the movies and series you love, anytime, anywhere and on any device.

• Stream exclusive, award-winning series.
• Enjoy simultaneous US show releases.
• Watch your favorite content in stunning 4K.
• Create up to 5 profiles and stream on 5 devices.
• Get personalised movie and series recommendations based on your preference.
• Watch movies and shows with the kids using the dedicated KIDS mode, complete with parental controls.
• Download and watch shows and movies offline.


Classics on OSN+:
Watch everyone's favorite series like ""The Sopranos"", ""Game of Thrones"", ""House of the Dragon"", ""The Last of Us"", ""Friends"" and much more.

Trending on OSN+:
Stream series like “The Gilded Age” Season 3 or “The Hunting Wives”, and movies like “Harry Potter”, and ""Joker"". Make sure you don't miss the Turkish series: “One Love” and “Al Mushardoon”.

Upcoming gems on OSN+:
Don’t miss out on Hollywood movies like “Anora” and ""Wicked"", and upcoming hit series like “It: Welcome to Derry”, and others.

With flexible subscription options, OSN+ allows you to stream movies, TV shows, and more online. No binding contracts or cancellation fees.

For support, visit: https://help.osnplus.com/
For Terms & Conditions, visit: https://osnplus.com/terms
To view our Privacy Policy, visit: https://osnplus.com/privacy

Stream movies and shows from a collection featuring over 10,000 hours of premium content tailored for every family member. With OSN+, you're not just streaming, you can immerse yourself in the content and watch the movies and series you love, anytime, anywhere and on any device.

• Stream exclusive, award-winning series.
• Enjoy simultaneous US show releases.
• Watch your favorite content in stunning 4K.
• Create up to 5 profiles and stream on 5 devices.
• Get personalised movie and series recommendations based on your preference.
• Watch movies and shows with the kids using the dedicated KIDS mode, complete with parental controls.
• Download and watch shows and movies offline.


Classics on OSN+:
Watch everyone's favorite series like ""The Sopranos"", ""Game of Thrones"", ""House of the Dragon"", ""The Last of Us"", ""Friends"" and much more.

Trending on OSN+:
Stream series like “The Gilded Age” Season 3 or “The Hunting Wives”, and movies like “Harry Potter”, and ""Joker"". Make sure you don't miss the Turkish series: “One Love” and “Al Mushardoon”.

Upcoming gems on OSN+:
Don’t miss out on Hollywood movies like “Anora” and ""Wicked"", and upcoming hit series like “It: Welcome to Derry”, and others.

With flexible subscription options, OSN+ allows you to stream movies, TV shows, and more online. No binding contracts or cancellation fees.

For support, visit: https://help.osnplus.com/
For Terms & Conditions, visit: https://osnplus.com/terms
To view our Privacy Policy, visit: https://osnplus.com/privacy

apps.title: ZEE5 Movies, Web Series, Shows
apps.description:
Ready for an unparalleled streaming experience? Look no further than ZEE5, the world’s largest streaming platform for South Asian stories, where you can binge-watch the most trending titles.

Stream over 4000+ movies, 500+ originals, 2500+ TV shows, ILT20 cricket matches.
That’s not all. You can unlock and browse ZEE5’s vast content library with limited ads. Get ready to be transported to a world of spectacular stories and entertainment

What you will enjoy on the ZEE5 app:
● 4000+ HD Movies
● 500+ ZEE5 Originals
● The latest episodes of your favorite TV shows before the TV telecast
● Video content dubbed in 8 languages
● 12 display languages & 21 content languages
● Watch anytime, anywhere – download online & watch offline
● Live TV guide for channel programming
● Catch up on your favorite ZEE network shows
● Smart search including voice search
● Personalized content recommendation
● Seamless video playback
● 4k video streaming quality

Movies: Be the first to watch all brand-new movie releases. Want to discover films by genre or your favorite actor? You can find them all as per your preference. To watch your favorite Telugu, Tamil, Malayalam and Hindi movies, including other South Indian films in different regional languages, subscribe to ZEE5 today!

Watch popular movies on ZEE5: Bhagwat Chapter One - Raakshas, Madam Sengupta, Aabhyanthara Kuttavaali, Kishkindhapuri, Elumale, Aankhon ki Gustaakhiyan, Sumathi Valavu, House Mates, Fussclass Dabhade, Dakuaan Da Munda 3, Tehran, Maaman, Jarann, Bhairavam, The Bhootnii, Kaalidhar Laapata, Detective Sherdil, DD Next Level, Prince and Family, Costao, Sankranthiki Vasthunam, Mrs., Hisaab Barabar, Hanu-Man, Main Atal Hoon, The Kerala Story, Sam Bahadur, Kaatera, Gadar 2, Sirf Ek Bandaa Kaafi Hai, RRR.

TV Shows: Catch up your favorite shows anytime, anywhere. On ZEE5, you’ll find all the popular Hindi drama series and TV shows on ZEE, in Hindi, Tamil, Bengali, Malayalam, Telugu, Kannada, Marathi & more!

Popular TV shows on ZEE5: Tumm Se Tumm Tak, Kumkum Bhagya, Kundali Bhagya, Bhagya Lakshmi, Mazhi Tuzhi Reshimgaath, Sa Re Ga Ma Pa, Dance India Dance, Radhamma Kuthuru, Hitler Kalyana, Ninaithale Inikkum and more!

ZEE5 Originals: ZEE5 offers a diverse range of the latest web series to enjoy! Now binge-watch 270+ thrilling Originals at your fingertips!

Binge-worthy Originals on ZEE5: Janaawar - The Beast Within, Mrigaya: The Hunt, Shodha, Kammattam, Bakaiti, Mothevari Love Story, Sattamum Needhiyum, Viraatapalem, Ayyana Mane, Mithya, Manorathangal, Sunflower, The Broken News, Aindham Vedham, Gyaarah Gyaarah, Ayali, Mukhbir, and more!

WHAT TO WATCH: Explore a wide range of entertainment with hidden gems like Kakuda, Zombivli, Aranmanai 4, Brother, and more!
Best of International Series on ZEE5: Access the best of shows from across the globe. Watch amazing Indian, Turkish, Korean & Spanish shows on ZEE5.

Acclaimed international shows on ZEE5: My Golden Life, Friends: The Reunion, Mrs. & Mr Shameem, Churails, and more.

Live TV Shows: Stay up to date with access to 90+ live TV channels.

Kid Shows: We’re making childhood fun with an amazing line-up of content, especially for Kids.

Popular Kids’ shows on ZEE5: Love U Ganesha, Gadget Guru Ganesha, In Search of Titanic, Guddu, Dinofroz The Origin, The Jungle Book, Magic Ajji, Simba Junior: In New York & more!

Sports: Catch live matches, highlights, and updates from cricket, football, and more perfect for every sports enthusiast!

Watch Music Videos: Groove to the beats of the latest music with a vast library of music videos. Check out the latest pop releases, Bollywood songs, timeless melodies, party music and more!

apps.title: JioHotstar
apps.description:
Welcome to the world of infinite possibilities – where non-stop sports, endless entertainment, and countless stories come alive!

Stream the biggest live sports and cricketing action, catch the latest Bollywood, Hollywood and regional blockbusters, binge on hit TV shows before they air on TV, and dive into exclusive Hotstar Specials created just for you. You can also enjoy global hits from HBO, Peacock, and Paramount and explore the magic of Disney, Pixar, Marvel, Star Wars, and National Geographic. Whatever you love to watch, you’ll find it here—all in one place, only on JioHotstar, the ultimate hub for explosive live sports, cricket highlights, web shows, blockbuster movies & more!

What you'll love:

Non-stop sports. Endless entertainment. Only on JioHotstar.

A. LIVE Sports
• Watch India tour of Australia and South Africa tour of India, 2025
• Enjoy a superlative cricket viewing experience with our Commentary feed and detailed scorecards.
• Football fans, we’ve got you covered! Catch every thrilling match from the 2025-26 Premier League season.

B. Blockbuster Movies
From timeless classics to the latest hits, stream Bollywood blockbusters, regional gems, original movies, documentaries, and critically acclaimed films—all in one place.

Hollywood Movies:
Prey, Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull, Jungle Cruise, Ford vs Ferrari, Free Guy, & classics like Titanic, etc.

Bollywood Movies:
Kesari Chapter 2, 12th Fail, Sarfira, Do Aur Do Pyaar, Tumse Na Ho Payega, 1920, IB71, Selfiee, Brahmastra, King Of Kotha, Apurva, Atrangi Re, Gaslight, Freddy, Cuttputli, Liger, Gulmohar, Shiddat, Sadak 2, Bhuj, etc.

Regional Movies:
Manjummel Boys, Aavesham, Premalu, Kannur Squad, Neymar, Salaar,  Janaki Jaane, Corona Papers, Rudramambapuram, Vikram, Bheemla Nayak, Veera Simha Reddy, Jaya Jaya Jaya Jaya Hey, Akhanda, Bro Daddy, Mallikapuram & more

C. Superhit TV Shows
Web series that the world can’t get enough of, TV serials that the nation comes together to enjoy, and titles that are the talk of the town - find them all under the same roof only at JioHotstar.

Hindi Shows:
Anupama, Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai, Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin, Aashiqana, Gunaah, & more

English Shows:
Shogun, Skeleton Crew, Modern Family, Family Guy, Billions, The Bear, Only Murders in the Building & more

Regional Shows:
Bigg Boss, Cooku with Comali, Krishna Mukunda Murari, Eeramaana Rojaavey 2, Anurager Chhowa, etc.

Hotstar Specials:
Special Ops 2, Criminal Justice (All Seasons), Thukra Ke Mera Pyaar, Taaza Khabar, Lootere, Showtime, The Freelancer,  Koffee With Karan (All Seasons), Aarya (All Seasons), Aakhri Sach, The Trial, Commando, The Night Manager, City of Dreams, Kerala Crime Files, Human, Dahan & more

D. The Ultimate Disney+ Destination:
Enjoy the ever-expanding universe of stories from Disney+

Superhero movies & shows: Deadpool and Wolverine, Guardians of the Galaxy, Secret Invasion, Black Panther: Wakanda Forever, Avengers, Iron Man, Loki, Moon Knight, She-Hulk, etc.

Disney+ Originals: Ahsoka, Rennervations, The Mandalorian, Encanto, Turning Red, Disenchanted, Hocus Pocus 2, Moana, and more.

If you subscribe to JioHotstar via iTunes, payment will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase and your membership will automatically renew unless turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Subscription will be renewed within 24-hours before the end of each period at the rate of your selected plan. Turn off auto-renewal anytime through iTunes.

Privacy policy: https://www.hotstar.com/privacy-policy/in
Terms of use: https://www.hotstar.com/tnc/in

Get access to more than 250,000 new releases and catalog movies and TV shows to rent or buy, including the most extensive collection of 4K UHD titles, plus thousands of titles to watch for free – all with no subscription required.

Get the free Fandango at Home app and watch movies & TV anytime, anywhere. Plus, binge thousands of free movies and TV shows. Stream your favorites to your iOS mobile devices and other compatible devices with Airplay right from the app. Sign up for Fandango at Home today, it’s free, and there’s no subscription.

Get Fandango at Home on your favorite iOS mobile and smart devices:

• THE BEST DEALS ARE ON FANDANGO AT HOME

Exclusive discounts including personalized offers and Mix & Match bundles

• MORE CONTENT ON MORE DEVICES

Even more movies & TV shows to choose from on your favorite devices

• LARGEST SELECTION OF 4K UHD CONTENT

So many 4K UHD movies and TV shows to choose from, with options including Dolby Vision(R), Dolby Atmos(R) and HDR10

• EVERYTHING YOUR DIGITAL LIBRARY NEEDS

Easy ways to manage your movies and TV shows, and transfer your physical discs to your digital library

• NOW IN THE FANDANGO FAMILY

Rotten Tomatoes reviews and collections, Fandango and Fandango at Home gift cards, FanRewards loyalty rewards, and partner programs

• FAMILY-FRIENDLY FEATURES

Safer viewing with Kids Mode, Common Sense Media ratings & reviews, parental controls & more

apps.title: Angry Birds Blast
apps.description:
Blast into a new Angry Birds puzzle adventure game! The birds are trapped inside balloons, and you can bet the pigs are behind it all. Tap matching balloons to blast them to smithereens and free the flock!

Use your balloon-bustin’ skillz to outsmart the pigs and save birds in over 4500 egg-celent levels! Find the smartest way to solve puzzles, crack high scores, and earn three stars.

Grab rewards every day in the Daily Quest. Already got ’em? Then go join the weekly events or chase down this month's puzzle pieces. Blasted through those? How about taking on the world in the global leaderboard?

There’s plenty to do, and an ever-growing number of levels to master so get BLASTING!

Features:
· 4500+ FUN LEVELS – with more added weekly!
· PICK UP AND PLAY – any time, any place even OFFLINE!
· TEASE YOUR BRAIN – with challenging & strategic gameplay!
· CREATE BOOSTERS – rockets, bombs, laser guns!
· DAILY CHALLENGES – earn free rewards and boosters!
· WEEKLY EVENTS – Mighty League, Treasure Hunt and more!
· PUZZLE CHASE – find pieces to new puzzles every month!
· PLAY WITH FRIENDS – connect to Facebook, yo!
· GLOBAL LEADERBOARDS – earn your spot with high scores!
· iMESSAGE STICKERS – a little Blast for iMessage!

----------------

We may update the game periodically, for example to add new features or content or to fix bugs or other technical issues. Please note that the game may not function properly if you do not have the newest version installed. If you have not installed the latest update, Rovio will not be responsible for the game failing to function as expected.

Need some help? Visit our support pages, or send us a message! https://support.rovio.com/

----------------

Angry Birds Blast! is completely free to play, but there are optional in-app purchases available. Either way, you’ll have a blast! Get it? I’ll see myself out...

Terms of Use: https://www.rovio.com/terms-of-service
Privacy Policy: https://www.rovio.com/privacy

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

apps.title: Party Star -Live, Chat & Games
apps.description:
Good news for everyone, there is a chance to become star for free!
Do you want to be a star who attract everyone's attention? Come to Party Star! 
There are not only wonderful live stream, totally free group voice chat rooms, 1v1 private conversation, multiple funny activities and various games, but also exquisite gifts and magical entry effects that will surprise you, so come and join in! 

Features:
「Wonderful live stream」
- You can go live and watch live stream whenever you want.
- There are various types of live stream here, you can chat with the hosts in real time, watch wonderful dances, listen to beautiful singing, enjoy talk shows and so on.Features 

「Free group voice chat rooms」
- A variety of content rooms include singing, poems, games, making friends and more high- quality content rooms are waiting for you to choose. Thousands of broadcasters are always ready to welcome you.
- Join a group voice chat room and start your voice journey. Here, you can share your life with friends and make new friends around the world through your voice.

「Game center」
- There are various games in Party Star, for instance, Ludo, Billiards, Carrom and other games for Arabs,  with perfect and high-quality voice chat when playing.

「Private conversation」
- Create your own private room, invite your love into the room to chat in real time, use voice to convey thoughts on days when you can't see each other, and close the distance between love.

「Exceptional gifts and entrance effects」
- Send your love unique gifts to show love, use gifts to maintain the emotional bond between you and your new or old friends, everyone is eager to receive gifts from others, and every gift sent to you by friends is a wish for your happiness!

What are you waiting for, click to download Party Star. Party Star provides you with a platform to create a star identity, Party Star welcomes everyone to join, and builds a beautiful entertainment community!

apps.title: Fever: Events & Tickets
apps.description:
DISCOVER THE BEST EXPERIENCES IN YOUR CITY

With Fever, the wealth of events happening in your city is at your fingertips. Discover what to do, where to go, and what to visit. Find local events, secret places, and trendy pop-ups, some of which are available exclusively on Fever. 

DISCOVER EXCLUSIVE EVENTS THAT YOU CAN ONLY FIND ON FEVER:

Jurassic World: The Exhibition
Stranger Things: The Experience
The Queen's Ball: A Bridgerton Experience
Van Gogh: The Immersive Experience
And many more!

UNIQUE FEVER FEATURES:

- Exclusive events: Access to exclusive events that you can only find on the Fever platform.
- Fever Club: A reward system on all ticket purchases thanks to your Fever wallet.
- Fever filters: Handy filters that allow you to search by date & time.
- Favorite events: A list of your favorite experiences for easy access to the events that you like the most.
- Ticket transfers: An easy ticket transfer system that allows you to send friends and family tickets with no fuss.
- Map of event locations: An up-to-date map that shows you the events near you and in your city.
- User-based recommendations: Personalized recommendations for events and experiences based on your likes.
- Fully mobile, paper-free tickets: No printer required as tickets are scanned from your mobile device.
- Customer Support: 24/7 chat service with our Customer Support team, available in 8 languages.

ALL TYPES OF EVENTS AND EXPERIENCES

- Tours, trips, adventure: Discover new places and experiences in your city that you've never even heard of! 
- Arts & museums: Visit your city’s cultural havens for a tranquil day out.
- Concerts & festivals: Watch your favorite musicians and artists as they perform at some of the most exclusive venues in your city.
- Theater, comedy, shows, & AMC cinemas: Laugh, cry, sing and shout at the best shows and latest movie screenings.
- Food experiences: Taste the world at a wide variety of gastronomic experiences.
- Drinks & after-work activities, nightlife, parties: Dance the night away at some of the city’s hottest nighttime spots.
- And much more!

AVAILABLE CITIES IN THE US: New York, San Francisco, Los Angeles, Miami, Boston, Chicago, San Diego, Washington DC, Atlanta, Philadelphia, Seattle and many more!

To check out the Fever platform and for any other information, you can take a look at our website https://feverup.com/en or contact our 24/7 support service via chat, phone and email at hi@feverup.com.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
raw_data.releaseNotes:
At Fever, we aim to inspire people with experiences and make it easier than ever to find the best live entertainment in your city. With the help of personalized recommendations, discover and get tickets to local events that are most suited to you. 

- Get the latest version of the Fever app to enjoy the most up-to-date app experience so that you can find events and purchase tickets as quickly and efficiently as possible. 

- In this update, we fixed bugs and improved other small features of the app. This way, we can make sure that you have a better experience purchasing your event tickets. 

We hope you enjoy this new version of the app. If you have any suggestions or issues, please feel free to email us at hi@feverup.com. We'll be more than happy to help.

apps.title: ViX: TV, Sports and News
apps.description:
Disfruta de ViX, el servicio de streaming en español más grande del mundo.
Más de 100 canales en vivo y on-demand con novelas, películas, series originales, deportes, noticias 24/7, microdramas, podcasts, música y mucho más.

¡Descarga la app y empieza a disfrutar en todos tus dispositivos favoritos, siempre en español! Mira ViX donde quieras, cuando quieras.

ViX GRATIS - entretenimiento sin pausa
- Series, comedias, películas, documentales y realities
- Fútbol en vivo: Liga MX, Ligas MX femeniles, partidos clásicos
- Noticias 24/7 y canales infantiles
- Microcontenido exclusivo para ver en cualquier momento
- Podcasts en video y audio sobre temas actuales
- Totalmente GRATIS y sin necesidad de tarjeta de crédito

ViX Micro - historias cortas que enganchan
- Descubre nuestros nuevos microdramas en formato vertical, diseñados especialmente para móvil.
- Episodios de 1–2 minutos, ideales para ver en cualquier lugar
- Títulos como El regreso de la Heredera Fugitiva, Me fui gata, volví perra, y más

ViX Música y Fiesta Latina - lo mejor de la música latina
Explora ViX Música, nuestra nueva sección de contenido musical con presentaciones exclusivas, especiales detrás de cámaras y acceso a los mejores momentos de iHeartRadio Fiesta Latina, el evento musical que celebra a los artistas latinos más importantes del momento.

ViX Premium - lleva tu experiencia al siguiente nivel
- Acceso total a novelas, series originales y estrenos semanales
- Películas exclusivas en español
- Todo el deporte en vivo que te apasiona, incluyendo: UEFA Champions League, FIFA Club World Cup, Copa Oro y Copa América, UEFA Nations League, Liga MX y Ligas femeniles, CONMEBOL y CONCACAF
- MLB y más eventos internacionales
- Contenido sin anuncios (según plan)
- Visualiza desde múltiples dispositivos al mismo tiempo
- Planes mensuales o anuales — cancela cuando quieras

La disponibilidad de contenido y funciones puede variar según la región.

Términos de Uso: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Disfruta GRATIS de la mejor experiencia de streaming con nuestra última actualización de ViX. Esta incluye estabilidad general y corrección de errores.

¡Estate atento a más actualizaciones en el futuro!

apps.title: Disney Emoji Blitz Game
apps.description:
Ready. Set. Blitz!

Collect and play with hundreds of Disney, Pixar and STAR WARS™ emojis like never before in exciting match 3 Disney games! Play fast-paced rounds of match-3 to earn Disney prizes, complete missions, and discover new emojis.

Collect Disney, Pixar and STAR WARS™ emoji characters and items from The Little Mermaid, The Lion King, Cinderella, Zootopia, The Muppets, Disney and Pixar’s Toy Story, Monsters, Inc., Finding Dory and more!

• COLLECT thousands of Disney, Pixar, and STAR WARS™ emojis and items
• CHAT with Disney, Pixar and Star Wars emojis
• POWER UP and blast the board
• CHALLENGE friends and rule the leaderboard
• SPECIAL EVENTS with new Disney games & challenges every day

Download today to play Disney games with all of your favorite characters!

For the best experience, we recommend playing this game on an iPhone 5 and above, or an iPad 3 and above. Playing on an iPhone 4S, iPad 2, or an iPad Mini (1st Gen) or older may result in a sub-optimal experience.

Please note that Disney Emoji Blitz is free to download and play, however, you can purchase some in-game items with real money. If you want to limit this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.

Under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download Disney Emoji Blitz.

Privacy Policy: http://www.jamcity.com/privacy/

Terms of Service: http://www.jamcity.com/terms-of-service/

apps.title: WEINC
apps.description:
Worldwide Entertainment Inc. is a network that utilizes the latest broadcasting and entertainment platforms accessible through Roku, Apple TV, and Amazon Fire Stick. We also service our consumers by providing a website and stand alone APP to ensure our viewers are always entertained. Our  objective is to provide our viewers with the best global programs that feature culture, artists of various genres, music videos, performances, comedy, fashion shows, travel destinations, culinary arts, current events, fact-based news, documentaries, reviews, and nightlife entertainment.

Our organization is dedicated to introducing and promoting businesses and entrepreneurship to companies where they can showcase their products and services. We ensure that they are treated with the utmost respect. WWE takes pride in demonstrating moral and ethical principles, as well as honesty, responsibility and accountability. 

Worldwide Entertainment Inc. is forecasted to reach a larger consumer base in local programming around the world. The management and other team members of WWE are devoted to growing its international presence to achieve a greater viewership and to attract people of all ages. We have an array of innovative ideas to bring to the platform which will give our viewers 24 hours of daily scheduled programming. WWE and its team members have successfully gained the experiences and knowledge to achieve and enhance our network. Our headquarters is located in Atlanta, Ga where we plan to build a state-of-the-art production studio. Our entertainment platform showcases live shows and events to our diverse communities and is highly rated among our competitors.  

Ultimately, our  long-term goal is to become a household name that is known for producing quality content that is entertaining, informative, and progressive for its global audience. Additionally, we will provide a platform for contributors within the lifestyle entertainment arena to share their ideas and make significant achievements. To reach a larger consumer base in programming, we will work tirelessly to expand our international presence in the United States, Canada, Africa, Europe, South America, and Asia. 

Worldwide Entertainment Inc, is a network with the ability to feature content and lifestyle that’s intriguing and unprecedented.

apps.title: 腾讯视频-《许我耀眼》独播
apps.description:
电视剧热播：
《芬芳喜事》古装喜剧上新啦！小辣任豪先婚后爱爆笑结缘
《金式森林》豪门争产风暴！郭晋安携众港星上演家族内斗刺激夺财
《围猎》王阳卧底追查毒枭，与俞灏明上演正邪较量，刺激十足！
《宴遇永安》全家穿到古代开饭馆！王影璐李昀锐轻喜来袭，嗑糖干饭快乐翻倍
综艺强档：
《地球超新鲜》收官之旅，龚俊回归！刘宇宁林一陕西话版《巴啦啦小魔仙》超绝；地球团再次挑战默契度，龚俊被陈赫感动，王玉雯无条件选陈星旭，李乃文爆哭现场！
《心动的信号 第8季》哥妹CP开启“试恋”旅行，悬崖互诉爱意！蓝蓝焦哥秘密约会小方医生狂吃醋，更有易内耗的甜妹遇上温柔引导型男嘉宾，究竟谁能成功牵手走到最后？
《战至巅峰 第4季》总决赛高燃开启！时代少年团逐梦登顶之路，周柯宇带队回归团魂燃炸，黄明昊杨超越为胜利放手一搏？
《令人心动的offer 第7季》刺激！4小时不间断直播实战，中传学霸上戏第一双强CP高能救场，曼大甜妹变职场人脉姐，迅速谈下多个嘉宾，贺峻霖直呼厉害！
《王牌对王牌 第9季》沙溢被贴脸拷问，坚定表示下辈子还会跟胡可结婚，刘涛自曝和刘宇宁演姐弟恋开心的不得了！给影后们演技排序让彭昱畅大破防，王牌家族集体遭冲澡惩罚。
《时差五小时 第2季》泰国王室副本开启！小胖武力担当一穿三逆风翻盘，爱思脑力担当引发全员猜疑，究竟谁能获得最后的宝座？
电影超燃：
《戏台》陈佩斯、黄渤领衔群星，嬉笑话世间、演绎民国荒诞众生相！
《恶意》陈思诚监制，张小斐、梅婷双影后飙戏，撕恶女真相！
《大突围》真实抗日战役改编，重温壮烈英雄史诗
《工厂蛇患》蟒灾降临致命猎杀，大逃杀一触即发
《星际宝贝史迪奇》蓝色外星小狗超萌登场，大眼汪萌化人心
《功夫梦：融合之道》71岁成龙大哥再战巅峰，重掀功夫狂潮
强势动漫：
《诛仙 第3季》道玄强开天机印决战兽神，鬼厉惊羽剑下诉恩怨！
《龙族 第2季》地铁异动！三人小队集结出发
《紫川 第2季》我今天就要带她走，我看谁敢拦我
《我在天庭收废品》仙界废品斩妖除魔
《斗破苍穹年番》百世成圣，踏上成帝之路！
精品短剧：
《暗渡春华》大女主逆袭爽剧！深宅小妾觉醒，掌命夺运！以血为利刃斗恶婆踹渣夫，打脸复仇！
《茧成蝶》先婚后爱，高冷霸总暗恋成真！虐渣男，斗绿茶，千金闪婚后被宠上天。
纪录片新热：
《废柴英雄》国家地理全新力作，演员赵又廷倾情配音，呈现少为人知的“废柴英雄”们在危机重重的自然界，展露出不同寻常的“超能力”！
《不安的星球》聚焦在生态系统受到灾难性冲击后，存活的野生动物！面对无数的挑战，它们始终顽强延续，通过适应与进化，在这颗躁动不熄的星球上生存。
《王阳明》以古代与现代两条线索穿越时空，通过演员辛柏青的演绎与重现，讲述王阳明的传奇人生。
《隆行天下之重走八千里路云和月》吴奇隆邢傲伟探寻之旅！从故乡出发，跨越八千里云月，踏上一场充满温度的文化寻根之旅，携一路星光见证时代变迁。
《桃之夭夭》央视网首档“她”视角人文访谈影像集，走进薛凯琪、陈妍希等六位女性的日常，从成长轨迹与思考体悟中，获得启迪与新生动力！
儿童节目：
《熊出没之神奇宝物》熊大熊二与光头强的最新故事登场！全新冒险开启啦！

Introducing VIP Baloot, the ultimate online multiplayer card game that's taking the Arab world by storm!



Connect with players from around the globe and engage in lively conversations.



This game is your ticket to endless fun and strategy, uniting the crème de la crème of Baloot players while offering exclusive social features you'll find only on VIP Baloot.



Baloot, whether you call it Balot or Balut, is easy to grasp yet challenging to master. But with VIP Baloot, you can become a Baloot virtuoso and play anytime, anywhere.



VIP Baloot's lifelike online gameplay elevates it to the pinnacle of excitement in the card game world.



Are you prepared to dive into the renowned world of strategy and multiplayer card games, complete with voice chat? VIP Baloot is your destination!



Unlock the Benefits of Being a VIP Baloot Member:
- Join Thrilling Tournaments
- Engage in Public Chats
- Play with Your Friends
- Claim Daily Chips
- Give and Receive Likes for Profiles and Images of Friends



And, as a VIP Member, Enjoy Even More Privileges:
- Access Public and Private Chats
- Flaunt the Exclusive VIP Border
- Spruce up Conversations with Special Phrases

- Host Your Own VIP Sessions

For a Shiny Upgrade, Dive into VIP Baloot Gems:

Keep up with new episodes of All American and Walker, stream hit series like Wild Cards, Grimm, Party of Five and Marvel’s Runaways, or find your new favorite film in our fast-growing movie collection. And we’ve got sports! Stream every LIV Golf tournament live and catch up on the latest football action with Inside the NFL.

LATEST EPISODES: Watch new episodes of primetime shows the day after broadcast.

apps.title: RTÉ Player
apps.description:
RTÉ Player is the home of must-see TV in Ireland, live and on-demand. Watch 1000s of your favourite RTÉ shows. Full series of gripping drama from home and abroad, soaps, live sporting action and entertainment shows everyone’s talking about.

Browse and switch between RTÉ channels - RTÉ One, RTÉ 2, RTÉ News and RTÉ Kids on the go.

Entertain little ones with RTÉ Player Kids. A world of fun, learning and entertainment with the best RTÉJr programmes live and on demand.

KEY FEATURES

- Don’t miss a minute of the action, breaking news or live sport.

-Discover the most-talked about shows like Room to Improve, Kin and Smother.

-Access shows with in-vision Irish Sign Language (ISL) and Audio Description (AD)

-Sign in to RTÉ Player to continue watching shows and pick up where you left off on any device.

-Sign in and get recommendations tailored to you, making picking what to watch easier than ever.

-Watch later. ‘Favourite’ a program to create a watchlist of programmes to go back to, so you don’t miss RTÉ’s most talked about shows.

-Share your favourites with friends through social sharing.

The RTÉ Player App uses streaming technology which means that you must be connected to the Internet in order to watch programmes. The app will automatically adjust video quality based on the speed of your WiFi connection.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

Browse and switch between RTÉ channels - RTÉ One, RTÉ 2, RTÉ News and RTÉ Kids on the go.

Entertain little ones with RTÉ Player Kids. A world of fun, learning and entertainment with the best RTÉJr programmes live and on demand.

KEY FEATURES

- Don’t miss a minute of the action, breaking news or live sport.

-Discover the most-talked about shows like Room to Improve, Kin and Smother.

-Access shows with in-vision Irish Sign Language (ISL) and Audio Description (AD)

-Sign in to RTÉ Player to continue watching shows and pick up where you left off on any device.

-Sign in and get recommendations tailored to you, making picking what to watch easier than ever.

-Watch later. ‘Favourite’ a program to create a watchlist of programmes to go back to, so you don’t miss RTÉ’s most talked about shows.

-Share your favourites with friends through social sharing.

The RTÉ Player App uses streaming technology which means that you must be connected to the Internet in order to watch programmes. The app will automatically adjust video quality based on the speed of your WiFi connection.

apps.title: Kick - Live Streaming
apps.description:
Kick’s a live streaming platform where creators kick it with their communities. (Yeah, we said the thing…)


Our creators march to the beat of their own drum, as do we, disrupting our opps with a 95-5 subscription split, our creator incentive program, and the freedom to multistream.


That’s why the likes of xQc, Amouranth, and MaxHolloway all pick Kick.


For viewers, it’s the fear of missing out that compels them to tune in, the chance to be part of internet culture, all in real-time and ad-free.


but lets be real, no one reads these, so if youve made it this far, at least give the app 5 stars. it will good for my performance review. thanks :)


P.S. Peep the boring stuff at kick.com/terms-of-service

apps.title: HoneyReels
apps.description:
[Product function]

HoneyReels is a high-quality APP for browsing high-quality short plays anytime and anywhere. The product has genuine content, wonderful plot, full of novel creativity, ultra-high definition, and rich leisure life.


-- A large amount of content: accumulate a large number of short play resources, covering all kinds of themes and styles, including ancient costume, modern city, counterattack, etc. Users can easily browse and collect their favorite film and television works.
-- Clean and smooth :HoneyReels is committed to providing a clean and smooth video playback experience,
-- Member privileges: Members can enjoy all film sources, and more rights and interests will be opened in the future, please pay attention!


[Member rights and interests]
- Member rights and interests: Free to watch all short play sources, enjoy high-definition picture quality, advertising privileges, and other value-added rights and interests

- Subscription period :1 week, 1 month, 3 months, 12 months
Payment: When the user confirms the purchase and pays, it is credited to the iTunes account

[Subscription Service]
1. Subscription Name: Honey Reels Weekly Benefits
1.1. Subscription Period: The subscription is valid for 7 days from the date of purchase. Upon purchase, 1050 Coins + 630 Bonus will be immediately issued to your account. During the validity period, you can receive an additional 60 Bonus daily by checking in (totaling 420 Bonus). The maximum you can receive from purchasing the subscription is 1050 Coins + 1050 Bonus.
1.2. Price: The price of the subscription is $14.99
(excluding tax). It will be deducted from your account after you agree to purchase it.
1.3. Automatic Renewal: This subscription is set to automatically renew. Within 24 hours before the current subscription period expires, you agree to continue subscribing for the next period, we will charge your account.
1.4. Canceling Subscription: At least 24 hours before the subscription expires, you can cancel automatic renewal at any time in the "Settings".
2. Subscription Name: Honey Reels Monthly Benefits
2.1. Subscription Period: The subscription is valid for
30 days from the date of purchase. Upon purchase,
2100 Coins + 1350 Bonus will be immediately issued to your account. During the validity period, you can receive an additional 60 Bonus daily by checking in (totaling 1800 Bonus). The maximum you can receive from purchasing the subscription is 2100 Coins + 3150 Bonus.
2.2. Price: The price of the subscription is $29.99
(excluding tax). It will be deducted from your account after you agree to purchase it.
2.3. Automatic Renewal: This subscription is set to automatically renew. Within 24 hours before the current subscription period expires, you agree to continue subscribing for the next period, we will charge your account.
2.4. Canceling Subscription: At least 24 hours before the subscription expires, you can cancel automatic renewal at any time in the "Settings".

[Warm reminder]

- If you encounter problems, please try to open: "Settings -FAQ" describe the details of the problem, we will follow up to solve.
- If your problem is still unresolved, please send it to the customer service box :service.honeyreels@gmail.com.
-- We are always on the way to fix bugs and optimize products, and your feedback is the biggest help for our subsequent improvement of services!

Privacy Policy：https://res.yawentv.com/public/privacy_policy.html
User Agreement：https://res.yawentv.com/public/user_agreement.html

apps.title: NetShort - Popular Dramas & TV
apps.description:
Welcome to NetShort, a next-generation HD streaming platform where we offer exclusive vertical TV programming. Our goal is to change how you watch movies, allowing you to enjoy mini-series up to one minute long anytime, anywhere. Whether you're at home or on the go, NetShort lets you watch the most popular mini-series, providing an immersive viewing experience. Join us today!

Here's what awaits you:

"Exclusive Personal Theater"
Easily explore popular genres like romance, fantasy, martial arts, and time travel. All exciting mini-series are authorized. New episodes are added daily and weekly, keeping you immersed in imaginative worlds.

"Customize Your Experience"
Let NetShort's customizable features bring you a personalized viewing experience. Adjust video playback settings as you like, explore various genres, and plan your watchlist. In this vast realm of outstanding short videos, create a personalized journey tailored to your preferences. Your entertainment, your customization!

"Exclusive Originals"
Explore a world of content you won't find elsewhere. At NetShort, we're excited to present a series of exclusive original short videos. We promise fresh perspectives, unique narratives, and unparalleled creativity. Immerse yourself in diverse and captivating stories, each showcasing the art of concise and powerful storytelling.

"Frequent Updates"
Experience the joy of discovering new content through NetShort's regular updates! Our library continues to expand, ensuring each visit to the app brings fresh and engaging episodes. Say goodbye to mundane routines and embrace an endless stream of entertainment trends!

What are you waiting for? NetShort: Popular Short Dramas & TV is free to use, offering exclusive benefits for those seeking a more immersive experience.

Download now and dive deep into the world of entertainment!


Notice:
If you subscribe through Apple, the payment will be deducted from your App Store account upon purchase confirmation.
Your subscription will take effect within 24 hours after purchase, depending on the status of your order in the Apple Store. 
Within 24 hours before the current subscription period ends, the system will charge the renewal fee from your account based on the selected plan. After the renewal payment is processed, your subscription period will be automatically extended.
You can cancel your subscription by going to Settings > iTunes & App Store > Apple ID > View Apple ID > Subscriptions > Netshort. If you do not unsubscribe at least 24 hours before the current subscription ends, this subscription will be automatically renewed.

User Agreement:https://netshort.com/agreement/1
Privacy Policy: https://netshort.com/agreement/2
Automatic Renewal Agreement: https://netshort.com/agreement/3
Membership Service Agreement: https://netshort.com/agreement/4

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

apps.title: Light DJ Entertainment Effects
apps.description:
Connect to Philips Hue Entertainment, LIFX, and Nanoleaf Light Panels and take command of your music & entertainment lighting needs. Customize one of over 100+ lighting effects using the app's 3 unique light controllers, or create your own custom effects. Light DJ has been used in lots of creative applications, including special effects for home DJs, house parties, stage & video productions, holiday decorations, mood lighting for bars & restaurants, haunted houses, or just to create the ultimate music listening experience in your living room. Light DJ is the #1 app for configurable entertainment effects for smart lighting.

MUSIC VISUALIZER: Create the ultimate music listening experience. The app listens to your music and changes the effects based on the mood of the song. Lights get active during intense parts of a song and flowy with softer melodies and magically change colors at just the right moment. Special controls for Nanoleaf allow you to control rotation and fill angle to match your Aurora or Canvas panel orientation.

BEAT-SYNCED EFFECTS: Use the Super SceneMaker controller for looping effects that sync to the beat of your music. Each of the 100+ effects can be customized with your favorite colors. Play and mix local audio tracks into your playlists and sheets or select one from Apple Music.

HUE ENTERTAINMENT: Using a Hue Entertainment area you'll enjoy higher quality effects; all of Light DJ's effects respond faster and with better sync. Send waves of color across your room with the updated Groove Wave effect, or strobe faster with the Matrix controller.

EFFECT MAKER: Create your own looping special effects with our powerful Effects Maker. Share your custom-made effects & sheets using AirDrop.

IPAD VERSION: A DJ controller-inspired design for ultimate live-performance lighting control. Configurable sheets allow you to setup your effects and colors in advance, and the push-button interface lets making rapid changes easy.

STUFF FOR DJs: Precision tempo controls allows you to sync the lights with your set. Optional automatic beat detection using your device's built-in microphone. Also supports Ableton Link and MIDI Clock Sync for syncing tempo across devices, and MIDI Program Change or Control Change codes for controlling effects. 

Light DJ offers monthly and yearly subscription options. Each subscription includes:
-Full use of all of the app's controllers and effects
-Universal access & cloud sync
-Continual updates to support new hardware and features
-Direct email technical support (I respond to every email!)
-For more details see lightdjapp.com/blog

Visit lightdjapp.com for support and previews.

This app requires hardware from one of these vendors:
- Philips Hue: meethue.com
- LIFX: lifx.com
- Nanoleaf lights and panels (Shapes, Canvas, Lines, Elements, Blocks, Skylight, EXPO Cases, Aurora, A19 bulbs, LED strips, multicolor floor lamp, outdoor permanent and string lights, and holiday lights): nanoleaf.me

Your purchase will be applied to your iTunes account at the end of the trial. Subscriptions will automatically renew unless canceled within 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. You can cancel anytime with your iTunes account settings. Any unused portion of a free trial will be forfeited if you purchase a subscription.

Terms of Use: Subscription includes full access to the app including cloud backup & sync, periodic feature updates, and new light hardware support.

Privacy Policy and Terms of Use: http://lightdjapp.com/terms

------------------------------

Hi, I’m Kevin, the creator of Light DJ. I want everyone to have an incredible light show experience! If you’re having trouble connecting to your lights, don’t hesitate to email me at kevin@nrthrnlights.com. I’m here to help and always working to make Light DJ the best it can be.

raw_data.releaseNotes: Added support for Nanoleaf Rope Light. Fixed effect issues with Nanoleaf Floor Lamp.

apps.title: BBC: World News & Stories
apps.description:
THE BBC APP: News, stories, audio, videos and live coverage from our trusted global network of journalists.

BBC STORIES: The latest, breaking news headlines, articles, podcasts and videos, including coverage of world News, UK News, elections, BBC Verify, BBC In-Depth and more. Stories and videos covering business, innovation, culture, arts, travel, Earth, and much more.

LIVE COVERAGE: Follow live news updates and live global sport in our Live section.

BBC AUDIO: Listen to, save, and follow BBC podcasts such as The Global Story and World of Secrets. Browse schedules and live stream BBC Radio 4 or BBC World Service. From news, politics and culture to true crime, history and science, you can find the latest episodes or dive into the BBC audio archive.

WATCH BBC NEWS: Users in the US and Australia can stream live breaking news from around the world 24 hours a day on the BBC News channel.

BBC VIDEOS: Watch BBC News videos, BBC Sport videos, and video stories about climate, sustainability, science, health, technology, entertainment, and history.

BREAKING NEWS ALERTS: Sign up for breaking news notification alerts from BBC News, delivered straight to your mobile device.

FEATURES:
• Log into your BBC Account to save articles, podcasts and videos for later on the app and BBC.com
• Watch videos and listen to audio over both cellular and wifi
• Follow podcasts, save & download episodes to your mobile device or tablet 
• Download and listen to podcast episodes offline  
• Choose your settings to allow the app to automatically update in the background
• Control audio playback with sleep timer and live rewind
• Increase your font size for improved readability
• Choose dark mode for a dark-background reading experience
• Share stories, podcasts, and videos to social platforms like Facebook and WhatsApp, and send to friends via SMS and email
• Opt-in or opt-out of breaking news push notifications, you decide

ADDITIONAL INFO:
If you choose to receive push notifications, a unique identifier relating to your device will be stored by Airship on behalf of the BBC to provide you with the service. You can choose to unsubscribe from push notifications from BBC in your device’s ‘Notifications’ screen.

Our data processor AppsFlyer collects information on behalf of the BBC for attribution and analysis purposes. You can opt out from AppsFlyer tracking by filling out their ‘Forget My Device’ form: https://www.appsflyer.com/optout

The BBC will keep your information secure and not share it with anyone else in accordance with the BBC’s Privacy and Cookies Policy. To read BBC’s Privacy Policy go to https://www.bbc.com/usingthebbc/privacy/

If you install this app you accept the BBC Terms of Use at https://www.bbc.co.uk/usingthebbc/terms

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

apps.title: MLB
apps.description:
The MLB App is the #1 destination for live baseball video and audio, directly on your iOS device. Watch and listen live or on-demand!

-- Jump directly into your favorite team's live game from your home tab
-- Customize and filter your News content for the headlines that interest you most
-- Get real-time highlights and on-deck alerts for your followed players
-- Follow the action of the game with real-time player positions and batted balls
-- Live Activities support for game updates right on your lock screen


WATCH & LISTEN, FREE

-- The Watch experience has 24/7 personalized programming, curated content collections and the deepest baseball-on-demand video library anywhere
-- The Official Site of Major League Baseball Free Game of the Day (subject to blackout restrictions)
-- Watch free in-game, real-time highlights for every game
-- Watch select Minor League Baseball games
-- MLB Film Room: Search millions of videos
-- Picture-in-Picture streaming for live video and highlights
-- Watch MLB Network programming (pay TV authentication required)
 

SUBSCRIBERS GET MORE

-- Access your The Official Site of Major League Baseball subscription to watch every out-of-market game
-- Stream MLB Network 24/7 on the MLB app
-- Listen to Home, Away and Spanish-language (where available) radio broadcasts live and on demand with MLB At Bat
-- Watch 7,000+ Minor League Baseball games with MLB At Bat
-- Universal audio support for MLB At Bat subscribers, accessible on iPhone, iPad and other supported smartphones and tablets


Privacy Policy: mlb.com/privacy
Terms of Use: mlb.com/tou

© 2025 MLB Advanced Media, L.P. All Major League Baseball trademarks and copyrights used herein are the property of the applicable MLB entity.  All rights reserved.

Easily keep up with the things that interest you and watch TV shows, news, and sports from your phone. Dailymotion is a video platform made for you. Start exploring now and scroll in a safe environment!

Follow video updates from your favorite channels.
Curate a community and feed around your interests by interacting with different videos and channels.
Join the app that provides its users with a positive experience and positive algorithm.
Broaden your horizons with an algorithm that's made for exploration rather than engagement.

apps.title: stc tv
apps.description:
stc tv is an entertainment streaming service that offers the latest and greatest movies, TV shows, documentaries, kids’ programs, and more from top partners, including STARZPLAY, discovery+, Cartoon Network, & more. 

You can watch exclusives and originals that cannot be found anywhere else, plus popular live TV channels from regional & international networks. 

Watch as much as you want, whenever you want, anywhere you are. 

What you’ll enjoy with your stc tv Premium subscription: 
7 days free trial for the first time! 
Ad-free for uninterrupted viewing 
Unlimited access to exclusive content and our entire TV channels lineup. 
Up to 4K video quality on select titles. 
Up to 14 days of rewind TV 
Stream from multiple devices, and up to 4 devices at the same time. 
Download and watch offline 
Cancel anytime/no contracts and no commitments 

Download the app and sign up to enjoy a sneak peek of our content and features with the “Basic” plan, or experience unlimited entertainment under the “Premium” plan, with 7 days free trial for the first time.

• After the end of your free trial, your subscription charge will be SAR 14.99/month. 
• Your iTunes account will be charged with the monthly payment at confirmation of purchase unless you are in free trial period. 
• Your subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. 
• Your iTunes account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. 
• Subscriptions and auto-renewal may be managed and turned off by going to your Account Settings after purchase. 

• Terms & Conditions: https://www.stctv.com/en/terms 
• Privacy Policy: https://www.stctv.com/en/privacy/

raw_data.releaseNotes:
A new version of stc tv is available. Update your app to take your streaming experience to new heights.

General enhancements and bug fixes for a more enjoyable streaming experience.

apps.title: WePlay - Game & Party
apps.description:
WePlay is a Party Game app that young people love to play. It offers the most popular casual party games and voice interaction. You will get more fun when playing this games! 

[Online Party Game Bar]
Grab Mic: Sing the hottest songs and show off your singing voice!
Ludo：The a classic board game played between friends and family 
Who is Spy: a social game that tests reasoning and acting skills
Draw & Guess: it not only tests your creativity but also your teamwork and drawing skills!
WeParty: The most popular game where civilians and killers pit their wits against one another!
More and more new party games will be released in WePlay!

[New Interactive Features]
Image & Cloth Changing: Create a 3D image, face pinching, model clothes, show your self-image!
VIP gift: Become the VIP of WePlay and get the unique gifts which includes the special rings and other privilege!          
Play games, sing and do interesting things in WePlay!
In WePlay, there are always humorous and friendly games waiting for you.

apps.title: Yome - Novel,Audiobooks&Drama
apps.description:
ยินดีต้อนรับสู่ YOME โลกแห่งความบันเทิงที่พร้อมให้คุณสนุกอย่างครบวงจร ทั้งนิยายสุดฟิน มินิซีรีส์ครบรส หนังสือเสียงหลากแนว ไลฟ์สดสุดฮฮต  และกิจกรรมบันเทิงอื่น ๆ มากมาย ไม่ว่าคุณจะชอบดูซีรีส์ ร้องเพลง แชทเสียง หรือหาความสนุกสนานYOME จะทำให้คุณไม่มีวันเบื่อ สัมผัสความบันเทิงเต็มรูปแบบ เติมสีสันความสนุกได้ทุกวันไปกับเรา!
【นิยายคุณภาพ】
ทั้งแนวรักโรแมนติก ดราม่าน้ำตาร่วง ฟินจินหมอน ไปจนถึงการพลิกชะตาชีวิต แนวลึกลับลุ้นระทึก สยองขวัญสั่นประสาท มีอัปเดตทุกวันไม่มีหยุด!
 นิยายฮอตฮิต ออริจินัลสุดพิเศษ ตอบโจทย์ทุกสไตล์การอ่าน
 เนื้อเรื่องเข้มข้นทุกตอน พนันได้เลยว่าต้องติดหนึบ!
 เปิด YOME เมื่อไหร่ก็อ่านได้ลื่นไหล ไม่มีโฆษณารบกวน ดื่มด่ำในโลกของเรื่องราวที่เป็นของคุณเอง
【ประสบการณ์ฟังหนังสือเสียงรูปแบบใหม่】
เพียงหลับตาและเปิดหู ก็พร้อมเข้าสู่โลกของเสียงที่เต็มไปด้วยจินตนาการ มาพร้อมกับนักพากย์มืออาชีพ สื่ออารมณ์อย่างลึกซึ้ง ฟิน อิน จิ้นไปกับเสียงของตัวละครที่ชอบ ไม่ว่าจะฟังระหว่างเดินทาง ก่อนนอน หรือขณะทำงานบ้าน ก็ไม่รู้สึกเหงา
ไม่ว่าแนวไหนก็พร้อมเสิร์ฟ เลือกฟังได้ไม่จำกัด!
 พร้อมทั้งระบบแนะนำอัจฉริยะช่วยให้คุณเจอเนื้อหาที่ถูกใจในทันที!
【มินิซีรีส์ยอดนิยม】
อัปเดตซีรีส์สั้นใหม่ทุกวัน! ไม่ว่าจะเป็นรักหวานซึ้งกับคุณประธาน หรือเรื่องราวการเอาคืนพร้อมแก้แค้นสุดมันส์ จนคุณไม่อยากหยุดดู!
 พล็อตเข้มข้น เร้าใจทุกนาที สนุกได้ทุกที่ทุกเวลา มีให้เลือกหลายแนว อัปเดตเนื้อหาต่อเนื่องไม่มีหมด!
 ดูได้แบบไร้โฆษณาคั่น เพลินจนลืมเวลา!
【ปาร์ตี้ออนไลน์หลากหลายสไตล์】
พูดคุยพร้อมปาร์ตี้สนุกกับเพื่อนใหม่ได้ทุกที่ทุกเวลา!
 ห้องไลฟ์สไตล์ใหม่ สูงสุด 4 คน พร้อมทั้งห้องแชทแบบวิดีโอได้สูงสุดถึง 8 คน!
 มาคู่กับกิจกรรมสุดบันเทิง ไม่ว่าจะเกม หรือมุก สนุกไม่รู้จบ
【PK ระหว่างสตรีมเมอร์】
การดวลสุดมันส์แบบเรียลไทม์ จัดอันดับทันที!
 พร้อมผลักดันสตรีมเมอร์คนโปรดของคุณให้ชนะคู่แข่ง ด้วยพลังจากแฟนคลับทั่วประเทศ
 โชว์ความสามารถให้เต็มที่ แล้วชิงชัยชนะไปพร้อมกัน!
ยึดมั่นในสิ่งแวดล้อมการไลฟ์สดที่ดีต่อสุขภาพ เป็นมิตร พร้อมให้คุณแชทกับแบบใกล้ชิดทันที และรับฟังเสียงที่ปลอบโยนหัวใจ
เส้นทางชีวิตบันเทิงสุดยูนีค รอคุณอยู่ที่ YOME
 ด้วยความรู้สึกที่จริงใจ เพื่อพบกับเสียงที่ใช่ สำหรับทุกวันของคุณ
 ดาวน์โหลด YOME ได้แล้วตอนนี้ แล้วมาพบกับเพื่อน ๆ ที่น่าสนใจจากทั่วโลก มาสนุกด้วยกัน!
เริ่มประสบการณ์ใหม่ ด้วยเนื้อหาเสียงที่เชื่อมโยงทุกความฝัน
ติดต่อฝ่ายบริการลูกค้า: yomeliveth@gmail.com

raw_data.releaseNotes:
1.Optimize user experience.
2.Fix some problems.

apps.title: Wing Fighter
apps.description:
Wing Fighter is an free classic arcade online shooting game, with epic 3D realistic scene, gorgeous and fascinating combat effects and variety of unique bosses and equipment. If you loved arcade shooting games as a kid, this retro, vintage game blend modern combat styles would be the perfect game for you!
In every battle of Wing Fighter, You will become an air force pilot, controlling different fighters to fight evil enemies and bosses. It is your mission to defeat them and protect the safety and freedom of the skies! Enemies have invaded, the battle is on the verge of breaking out, come on and start this thrilling combat flight action game now!

Features:
- Shoot down enemy fighters, challenge powerful and diverse ultimate bosses.
- Enrich equipment arsenal, hundreds kinds of equipment to choose. Turn your fighter into flying tank.
- Clone skill, furious mode, damage bonus...Choose strong fighters with multiple additional attributes as you wish!
- Hundreds of combat buffs, different buffs and attack strategies create different combat experiences.
- Complete the mission and unlock battle scenes and levels.
- Select multiple activity patterns from normal to nightmare.
- Improve fighter power, fight your way to the top of the Leaderboard!
- Complete daily missions to gain resources, lots of rewards are waiting for you.
- Choose your favorite beautiful pilots and send them out on tasks. 
- Mysterious talent system that combines Roguelike elements to increase combat power permanently.
- Challenge the limit and win big prizes in Endless voyage event.
- Easy to operate, no tutorial required.

Enjoy the classic thrilling combat flight action game--Wing Fighter. Don’t let the enemy conquer your freedom, shoot and be ready to attack right now! 
DOWNLOAD AND PLAY IT FOR FREE! 

Contact us: wszj6868@gmail.com 
Join us on Facebook:  https://www.facebook.com/WingFighterOfficial 
Join Discord to get support: https://discord.gg/2WaJZbqFAy

Enemies have invaded, the battle is on the verge of breaking out, come on and start this thrilling combat flight action game now!
