raw_data.description:
Listen to All the Audio You Love, All in One Place

Access over 100,000 live AM/FM radio stations from around the world, plus exclusive content from news, sports, music, podcasts, and audiobooks—all across your devices. Enjoy a broader range of audio than Pandora or iHeartRadio, all in one place.

Your Personalized Soundtrack

Tune in to your favorite live stations or explore 100,000+ AM/FM stations from 197+ countries. Whether you’re in the mood for Today’s Hits, Classic Rock, Smooth Jazz, or something else, TuneIn has you covered—offering more variety and control than platforms like Pandora or iHeartRadio. Discover legendary stations like 106.7 Lite FM, Power 105.1, 102.7 KIIS-FM, and more.

Apple Music Radio now on TuneIn

Apple Music Radio has landed. Stream Apple Music 1, Chill, Country, Club & Hits live on TuneIn. Catch your favorite artists like Billie Eilish, Ed Sheeran, The Weeknd, Frank Ocean and more.

Stay Informed with Trusted News

Get the latest headlines and live updates from top news sources like CNN, FOX News Radio, MSNBC, Bloomberg Radio, CNBC, NPR, and BBC. Access 24/7 news, including local, national, and global coverage. Stream news stations such as WNYC-FM, KQED-FM, and WTOP Washington DC, or stay informed with top podcasts like The Daily and Up First.

All Your Favorite Sports

From MLB and NFL to NHL and college sports, catch every game and never miss a play. With TuneIn, follow your team all season long with curated content and game-time notifications. Stream sports talk stations like ESPN Radio, talkSPORT, Fox Sports Radio, and local shows. Plus, enjoy on-demand sports podcasts like Undisputed, First Take, and The Bill Simmons Podcast.

Podcasts for Every Passion

Explore the world’s most popular podcasts, including Stuff You Should Know, Hidden Brain, Wow in the World, and more. Whether commuting, working out, or unwinding, TuneIn offers top global podcasts that you can stream on-demand.

Stream Everywhere, Anytime

Take TuneIn with you wherever you go. Listen on iOS, tablets, or connected devices. Control your audio experience with Amazon Alexa, Google Home, or in your car with CarPlay and compatible vehicles like Tesla, Mercedes, and Volvo.

Unlock Even More with TuneIn Premium

Upgrade to TuneIn Premium for ad-free content, exclusive features, and more:

Live Sports: Commercial-free coverage of NHL games, college sports, racing, and more—without blackouts.
Ad-Free News: Enjoy uninterrupted news coverage from CNBC, CNN, FOX News Radio, and more.
Unlimited Audiobooks: Access over 100,000 audiobooks with no extra cost or limitations.
Commercial-Free Music: Stream your favorite music stations non-stop with no ads.
Fewer Ads Across All Stations: Enjoy listening to 100,000+ stations with fewer interruptions than Pandora or iHeartRadio.

Subscribe to TuneIn Premium through the free app. If you choose to subscribe, you will be charged a monthly or annual subscription fee according to your country. The subscription fee will be shown in the app before you complete the payment. Your subscription will automatically renew every month or year at the then-current subscription fee unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the then-current subscription period. Your iTunes account will automatically be charged within 24 hours prior to the end of the then-current period. The subscription fee will be charged monthly or annually according to your subscription. You can turn off auto-renew at any time from your iTunes account settings.

Privacy policy: http://tunein.com/policies/privacy/
Terms of use: http://tunein.com/policies

apps.title: Family Island — Farming game
apps.description:
What would your life be without modern technology on the deserted island? Dive into simplicity of the primal world with the modern Stone Age family in this thrilling offline adventure game. Stranded on the remote island, a family of four - Bruce, Eva and their kids - needs your guidance and help starting a new family home from scratch and navigating through various family life situations with humour. 

After their previous city had been destroyed by a volcanic eruption, help this family build a thriving town, all while looking for a way to reconnect with their family and beloved tribe. In this farm game, their world might seem ancient and alien without modern day technology, yet their daily family life and relationships are very relatable in today’s world.

Family Island™ is a farm game full of unexpected twists and captivating adventure! 

FEATURES:
- Enjoy your adventure to the Stone Age era! Get creative and start farming, using cool ancient technologies 
- In this farm game, you can unleash your inner explorer and set on a thrilling adventure to new islands 
- Start your own family farm on the deserted island! Grow crops and craft useful goods to trade with other characters
- Customize your farm with beautiful decorations
- Get to know the family better and guide them through exciting quests and life stories in this island game

 ____________ 

Follow Family Island on Facebook and Instagram for exclusive offers and bonuses!
Facebook: facebook.com/familyislandgame/
Instagram: instagram.com/familyislandgame/


Terms of Service: https://static.moonactive.net/legal/terms.html?lang=en
Privacy Notice: https://static.moonactive.net/legal/privacy.html?lang=en
The game contains in-game purchases (including randomized items)

Questions about the game? Our support is ready and waiting at:  https://melsoft-games.helpshift.com/hc/en/11-family-island/

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Hey Islanders!
We're always improving Family Island! This update includes bug fixes, performance enhancements, and a whole lot of love to make your island life even better.
Explore, adventure, and win amazing rewards!
Want to share the fun? Invite your friends to play and get FREE REWARDS! Join our community on Facebook and Instagram for more fun.
Loving Family Island? Leave a review!

apps.title: Woody Block Puzzle Brain Game
apps.description:
WOODY Block Puzzle, a new relaxing block puzzle, is created JUST FOR YOU. Enjoy block puzzle games with a relaxing aesthetic and give your mind a workout at any time.

Inspired by one of the warmest natural materials, WOODY is crafted to help you emotionally re-charge, reduce stress and increase positive social interactions.

Try our NEW Story Mode! Play through exciting new limited-time levels to complete challenges, earn badges and let the story unfold.

Simply place wooden blocks into the grid and fill a row or column to earn points. With endless puzzles and multiple game modes, you can spend hours relaxing with block puzzle games.

Exercise your mind with the 10x10 wooden jigsaw to make your brain healthy and relaxed. Take a break any time with this free calming puzzle and see how much you can score.

Try to beat your top score, share your scores with friends and family or aim for the top of the scoreboard. However you want to play, WOODY Block Puzzle is here.

WOODY features:

Block Puzzle Game
• Place blocks to fill the grid
• Fill a row or column to earn points
• Endless levels – keep playing until you can’t fill any more
• Multiple game modes

Brain Training Game
• Keep your mind sharp with mental workouts
• Relax and stay focused with block puzzles
• Visually informative chart to check your progress every day
• Surprisingly challenging to break your high score

Adventure Puzzle Games
• Play through exciting story-based levels
• Earn rewards for completing challenges
• Limited time events & unique badges!

Relaxing Games
• Aesthetically designed with a rustic and country appeal
• Beautifully easy and simple, no pressure and no time limit

Share and Compete
• Instantly share on Facebook to compete with your friends and family
• Play challenge modes and earn a place on the leaderboard

Free and Simple
• Forever free to play
• Perfectly small install size that won’t hurt your storage
• This app offers in-app purchase

Play WOODY for free for as long as you like. If you would like to support the WOODY team, you can subscribe from within the app.

Relax and give your mind a workout with WOODY Block Puzzle today.

Why People Love WOODY Puzzle Block:

SOOTHING, NO PRESSURE WOODEN PUZZLE GAME
“If you like soothing, no pressure 10x10 puzzle with unlimited time, then you will definitely want to check out WOODY”

CHILL & RELAXING BOARD GAME
“WOODY is suitable for those who enjoy chillaxing with a graphically-appealing board game. It’s the best wooden jigsaw puzzle I’ve played. Love it”

EXCELLENT WOOD BLOCK PUZZLE
“WOODY gives me an excellent Zen experience. I love this wood block puzzle. It is very relaxing. So awesome”

SIMPLISTIC, CHALLENGING, INTRIGUING JIGSAW PUZZLE
“I definitely recommend this jigsaw puzzle. Simplistic, challenging, and intriguing!”

ADDICTING AND A LOT OF FUN 1010 BOARD GAME
“It is great to have a 10x10 board game that you don't have to be a genius to play. Simple yet challenging. Addicting and a lot of fun board game”

We hope you will love WOODY!
- WOODY team

*******
Information about the auto-renewal of subscription:
This is an auto-renewable subscription. A subscription is valid for 1 month, 6 months, or 1 year, depending on the subscription type selected.

- Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.
- Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase.
- Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase.
- Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. The cost depends on the selected plan.

Terms of Service: https://privacy.athena.studio/terms-of-service
Privacy Policy: https://privacy.athena.studio/

apps.title: Solitaire – Classic Card Games
apps.description:
Solitaire by Easybrain brings you one of the world's most famous classic card games. Designed for both beginners and seasoned players, Solitaire is the perfect game to keep your mind active and have hours of fun anytime, anywhere!

Solitaire has been popular all around the globe for decades for a reason: playing this timeless classic is a brilliant solution to sharpen your mind or simply unwind during a break. Our version of Solitaire is enhanced with smooth graphics and animations, background and card design options, various features to upgrade your gameplay experience, and many more things for you to explore and have a good time with!

Improve your strategy skills and train your brain while taking on Daily Challenges or reaching higher levels with every consecutive win in the main gameplay mode! Expand your winning streaks, earn more points with every game, and beat your high score. Adjust the difficulty by playing Draw 1 or Draw 3 mode, choose your theme, and enjoy countless hours of fun!

You’ll love playing this Solitaire:

· Master your skills to win Classic Solitaire games, move to higher levels and beat your best score. The higher the level, the more points you get!
· Win a special Daily Challenge: complete challenges, earn golden crowns daily, and collect a unique trophy every month.
· Participate in Seasonal Events, a fun way to unwind and improve your skills. Solve solitaire games of several difficulty levels, uncover unique thematic postcards and collect them all! Follow our updates and never miss a single event!
· Play different modes: Draw 1 or Draw 3.
· Use hints and undos if you’re stuck.
· Enjoy our simple tap or drag controls.
· Choose from a variety of backgrounds and card backs to help you concentrate and relax.

Take a break and train your brain with our Klondike Solitaire!

raw_data.releaseNotes:
- Performance and stability improvements

Thanks for playing Solitaire! We read all your reviews carefully. Please leave us feedback about why you love this game and what features you would like to see next!

apps.title: Deezer: Music Player, Podcast
apps.description:
Deezer is more than just a music platform.
It’s a fully personalized listening experience that adapts to you. From mood-driven mixes to curated playlists, discover music that sounds like you.

Deezer is where you can embrace your tastes, turn up the volume, and Live the Music.


With a Deezer Premium plan, you'll get everything you need in one app:


Music you love, made for you
• A massive catalog with all the tracks you could ever want
• Flow, your infinite, personalized mix of favorites and new discoveries
• Curated playlists for every mood, genre, or season
• Also explore Podcasts, Audiobooks*, and Radio*


Interactive and fun features
• Shaker lets you mix playlists with friends and compare your tastes
• Music Quiz tests your music knowledge — solo or with friends
• SongCatcher helps you find any song playing around you (even if you hum it)
• Deezer Club gives you a shot at winning exclusive live event tickets


Customization at your fingertips
• Shape your algorithm to find music that you love
• Create custom playlist covers
• Reorganize your Homepage and Favorites to put your top picks front and center
• Share any song or playlist — even with people who don’t use Deezer
• Dive deeper with lyrics, including translations


And of course, the essentials
• Ad-free listening, always
• Offline mode for when you’re low on service
• Unlimited skips and on-demand listening
• HiFi audio quality, so you never miss a beat


Choose your plan:
• Deezer Premium – One Premium account with all our features
• Deezer Duo – Two Premium accounts, one subscription
• Deezer Family – Up to 6 Premium accounts with kid-friendly profiles
• Deezer Student – Get all the benefits of Deezer Premium for half the price
• Deezer Free* - Full access to our catalog, with occasional ads and limited features


Take Deezer anywhere
Enjoy your music on all your favorite devices:

• Smart speakers like Alexa, HomePod Mini, & Sonos
• Wearables including Apple Watch, Fitbit & other Wear OS devices
• In your car with Automotive OS


On your wrist
Launch the Deezer app on your Apple Watch, Fitbit, or any Wear OS device and listen to your favorite tracks wherever you go.



Want more from Deezer?


Follow us:
Instagram: instagram.com/deezer
Facebook: facebook.com/deezer
X: x.com/deezer


Privacy policy

Terms of use



*Some features and plans may not be available in all countries.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
raw_data.releaseNotes: Full playlists can now be shared with friends on any app! Plus, we’ve raised the limits in your playlists and Favorites tab, giving you even more room to keep all your favorite tracks, artists, albums, and playlists close at hand.

apps.title: IMVU: Fun 3D Avatar Chat Game
apps.description:
Join millions of people around the world on IMVU, the world’s largest avatar-based social network where shared experiences build deeper friendships. IMVU is a destination with endless possibilities, allowing you to fully customize your 3D avatar to reflect who you are. Explore our chat rooms where you can meet new people, connect with friends and voice chat with anyone from around the world. Roleplay, dress up, party, go on a virtual date, host an event, and join a virtual world. And, it’s totally free!

Your dream life, love life, and virtual life await in IMVU, a metaverse where real life comes into play.

YOUR VIRTUAL LIFE
The avatar life is your life, make it what you want it to be! Want a love story? Go on a virtual date. Looking for friendship? You can make new friends from all over the world. Want to explore? A whole virtual reality awaits in IMVU’s metaverse. Want to make a lot of new friends? Host an event and earn tips!

CREATE YOUR AVATAR – DOLLIFY YOUR NEW SELF
Fully customize your 3D avatar and show how you really are. If you’re into fashion, this is your chance to share your style and dollify yourself over and over again. Design and dress your avatar that will help you make new friends. Shop without limits and dress up your avatar to suit your style!

3D SOCIAL CHATS – VIRTUAL CONVERSATIONS
Chat with friends or meet new people from all over the world! The 3D chat gives you full conversations that are more than instant messages. Talk, build connections, and share experiences together in your own virtual world.

GET SOCIAL AND SHARE YOUR MOOD
Change your poses, add filters, and post photos that will give people something to talk about. The virtual chat gives you a range of emotes, emoji and functions, bringing your 3D avatar to life.

EXPRESS YOURSELF WITH ANIMATED WITHMOJI
Take your virtual friendships to a whole new level. Chat with friends using your personal animated WithMoji. Enjoy the online social game with your friends, and role play your virtual life however you desire!

BECOME A VIP AND RECEIVE EXCLUSIVE ACCESS*
Live the VIP life and unlock exclusive status, bonus monthly Credits and features like Voice, Hosting, and Whisper. Voice chat with friends in Live Rooms, now available for VIPs! Host your own public room and throw a party that stands out for millions of users to collect tips!

*VIP Terms and Conditions:
https://www.imvu.com/next/policyhub/vipterms/

• The payment will be charged on your App Store account when confirming the purchase.
• Your subscription will be automatically renewed every month, 24 hours before the end of the current period.
• Your credit card will be charged through the App Store account, unless the automatic renewal is deactivated at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
• You can deactivate the automatic renewal anytime on your App Store account settings.
• Any share not used in the free trial period, if offered, will be lost when the user buys a subscription to the respective post.

VIP Subscription Prices:
• VIP Gold monthly subscription: Gold VIP + Host Badges, 1,000 Credits/mo, 1 Live or Public Room, Prioritized Support and Exclusive Gifts for US $4.99

• VIP Platinum monthly subscription: Platinum VIP + Host Badges, 2,000 - 4,400 Credits/mo, 5 Chat Rooms (up to 2 Live), Whisper, no third-party ads, VIP only avatar actions, 5% Catalog Discount, Prioritized Support and Exclusive Gifts for US $9.99

• VIP Diamond monthly subscription: Diamond VIP + Host Badges, 3,000 - 5,400 Credits/mo, 10 Chat Rooms (up to 3 Live), Whisper, no third-party ads, VIP only avatar actions, 5% Catalog Discount, Prioritized Support, Exclusive Gifts and Enhanced Daily Spins for US $19.99

raw_data.description:
Join millions of people around the world on IMVU, the world’s largest avatar-based social network where shared experiences build deeper friendships. IMVU is a destination with endless possibilities, allowing you to fully customize your 3D avatar to reflect who you are. Explore our chat rooms where you can meet new people, connect with friends and voice chat with anyone from around the world. Roleplay, dress up, party, go on a virtual date, host an event, and join a virtual world. And, it’s totally free!

Your dream life, love life, and virtual life await in IMVU, a metaverse where real life comes into play.

YOUR VIRTUAL LIFE
The avatar life is your life, make it what you want it to be! Want a love story? Go on a virtual date. Looking for friendship? You can make new friends from all over the world. Want to explore? A whole virtual reality awaits in IMVU’s metaverse. Want to make a lot of new friends? Host an event and earn tips!

CREATE YOUR AVATAR – DOLLIFY YOUR NEW SELF
Fully customize your 3D avatar and show how you really are. If you’re into fashion, this is your chance to share your style and dollify yourself over and over again. Design and dress your avatar that will help you make new friends. Shop without limits and dress up your avatar to suit your style!

3D SOCIAL CHATS – VIRTUAL CONVERSATIONS
Chat with friends or meet new people from all over the world! The 3D chat gives you full conversations that are more than instant messages. Talk, build connections, and share experiences together in your own virtual world.

GET SOCIAL AND SHARE YOUR MOOD
Change your poses, add filters, and post photos that will give people something to talk about. The virtual chat gives you a range of emotes, emoji and functions, bringing your 3D avatar to life.

EXPRESS YOURSELF WITH ANIMATED WITHMOJI
Take your virtual friendships to a whole new level. Chat with friends using your personal animated WithMoji. Enjoy the online social game with your friends, and role play your virtual life however you desire!

BECOME A VIP AND RECEIVE EXCLUSIVE ACCESS*
Live the VIP life and unlock exclusive status, bonus monthly Credits and features like Voice, Hosting, and Whisper. Voice chat with friends in Live Rooms, now available for VIPs! Host your own public room and throw a party that stands out for millions of users to collect tips!

*VIP Terms and Conditions:
https://www.imvu.com/next/policyhub/vipterms/

• The payment will be charged on your App Store account when confirming the purchase.
• Your subscription will be automatically renewed every month, 24 hours before the end of the current period.
• Your credit card will be charged through the App Store account, unless the automatic renewal is deactivated at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
• You can deactivate the automatic renewal anytime on your App Store account settings.
• Any share not used in the free trial period, if offered, will be lost when the user buys a subscription to the respective post.

VIP Subscription Prices:
• VIP Gold monthly subscription: Gold VIP + Host Badges, 1,000 Credits/mo, 1 Live or Public Room, Prioritized Support and Exclusive Gifts for US $4.99

• VIP Platinum monthly subscription: Platinum VIP + Host Badges, 2,000 - 4,400 Credits/mo, 5 Chat Rooms (up to 2 Live), Whisper, no third-party ads, VIP only avatar actions, 5% Catalog Discount, Prioritized Support and Exclusive Gifts for US $9.99

• VIP Diamond monthly subscription: Diamond VIP + Host Badges, 3,000 - 5,400 Credits/mo, 10 Chat Rooms (up to 3 Live), Whisper, no third-party ads, VIP only avatar actions, 5% Catalog Discount, Prioritized Support, Exclusive Gifts and Enhanced Daily Spins for US $19.99

apps.title: ROBBENT.COM
apps.description: Robb Entertainment is a  a New York-based multi-media and entertainment company that specializes in the production, marketing, and distribution of short and long-form entertainment, across multiple platforms. We also have operations in talent management; publishing; music; events; gaming; animation; advertising and much more. The company was established in 2008 by Romane Orlando Robb (romanerobb.com) and is a majority-owned subsidiary of Robb Corporation (robbcorp.com). For more information please visit us at robbent.com.

apps.title: SLIME - ISEKAI Memories
apps.description:
Enter the world of That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime in a new 3D battle RPG!

A new story supervised by Fuse, author of the original light novels! A mysterious girl named Shinsha appears, claiming to be Rimuru's daughter. What is her relation to Izis, the witch from the "mirror land"?

Relive famous moments from Season 1 of the anime in fully voiced cut scenes!
The star-studded vocal cast lend their talents to battle voices and interactions in town as well!

Use the nation-building system to create your ideal version of Tempest!
Build and position all sorts of buildings and facilities: your citizens' homes, restaurants, the blacksmith shop, the laboratory, magic-enhancing facilities, and more.
Walk through the town you've built and interact with your citizens to get a glimpse of their daily lives!

3D command-based battle system!
The controls are simple: just select the cards for your hand. But there's deep strategic gameplay to enjoy as you learn to effectively use abilities drawn from the original work! Enjoy dazzling finishing move animations that will make you feel like you've stepped into the anime!

Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc. Website:
https://bandainamcoent.co.jp/english/

[Caretaker's Crate Monthly Pass][Tempest's Treasure Monthly Pass][Tome of Wisdom Monthly Pass] Each pass is an automatically renewed paid monthly service that gives various items.
Players can try the service for the first month free of charge.

◆Caution
・This service is a paid service that automatically renews each month. Automatic renewal activates 1 month after purchasing the service.
・The first month of the service is a free trial, after which the service and its expiry period will automatically itself renew each month. Your Apple account will be charged monthly until you deactivate the service.
・Please be warned that even if you delete the app, unless you deactivate the service's automatic renewal process, said process will continue to renew itself.
・If you purchase this service multiple times using different Apple IDs, you will not receive duplicate rewards. Furthermore, requests for cancellation of payments relating to multiple/duplicate subscriptions will not be accepted.

■About Payment, Service Periods, and Renewals
・Payment for this service will be tied to your Apple ID and will occur immediately after joining.
・Players who do not cancel their subscription to this service 24 hours or more before its expiry period will automatically have their expiry period renewed.
・Expiry periods are automatically renewed within 24 hours of the expiry date. Players will be charged when the expiry period has automatically renewed.

■About Cancellation
・This service must be canceled more than 24 hours before the service's renewal date.
・Players can cancel their subscription to this service using the following steps.
1. Open "Settings" - "iTunes Store and App Store" - Tap "Apple ID"
2. "View Apple ID" - Tap "Register"
3. This screen will display content you are subscribed to. Select "Cancel registration"
・Please be aware that your subscription to this service will not be terminated by deleting the app.
・You can continue to enjoy the content of this service until the expiry period even after canceling your subscription.

■Other Warnings
・Please refrain from closing the app while payment is processing as this can potentially cause issues with your access to this service.

By downloading or installing this app, you agree to the Bandai Namco Entertainment Terms of Service.

Terms of Service:
https://legal.bandainamcoent.co.jp/terms/
Privacy Policy:
https://legal.bandainamcoent.co.jp/privacy/

Note:
This game contains some items available for in-app purchase that can enhance gameplay and speed up your progress. In-app purchases can be disabled in your device settings, see https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT201304 for more details.

This application is distributed under the official rights from the license holder.

apps.title: CBS Sports App: Scores & News
apps.description:
The CBS Sports App is everything a sports fan needs in one place. Get customized alerts based on your favorite teams, players and leagues, stream live games from CBS & Paramount+ and stay on top of the biggest news in the sports world. With the CBS Sports App, you’ll have the ability to watch NFL, UEFA Champions League, PGA Championship, Big Ten Football, the Masters, the NWSL, Concacaf Nations League, NCAA Basketball, WNBA and more—either free or via your existing TV provider.

With the CBS Sports app, you’ll get:

•The fastest app for scores and breaking news from all major sports, so you’re always the first to know 
• Advanced gametrackers to follow your team when you don’t have the ability to watch the game
• CBS Sports HQ, a 24/7 free sports news & highlights network with onsite coverage from the biggest sports events
• CBS Sports Golazo Network, a 24/7 free soccer channel with live matches, exclusive studio shows like Morning Footy and Box 2 Box, news, highlights, documentaries and more
• Select free live events and games, including The Masters, PGA Championship & PGA Tour, NCAA basketball, PGA Tour and more
• CBS & Paramount+ events including NFL, UEFA Champions League & Europa League, Big Ten football, Serie A, Concacaf Nations League, NWSL and more*
• Personalized sports news and video highlights from your favorite teams, leagues and athletes
• Breaking news from around the sports world, so you’re always up to date and never miss a moment
• Daily fantasy shows including Fantasy Football Today & Fantasy Baseball Today, so you can get the edge in your league this season
• A 24/7 stream of CBS Sports Network including: NCAA football & basketball games, Scottish Premier League, NWSL, Professional Bull Riding, and more
• Expert betting advice from SportsLine insiders via articles and live or on-demand video 

*Available via login from your TV provider and/or Paramount+ 

Please note: The CBS Sports app features Nielsen's proprietary measurement software which contributes to market research, like Nielsen's TV Ratings. Please see https://www.nielsen.com/digitalprivacy for more information

Terms of Use:  https://legal.paramount.com/us/en/cbsi/terms-of-use
Paramount Privacy Policy: https://privacy.paramount.com/policy
Your Privacy Choices: https://privacy.paramount.com/app-donotsell
California Notice:  https://privacy.paramount.com/en/policy#additional-information-us-states

raw_data.releaseNotes:
- We've added Live Activities for NFL and College Football! You can now track live scores and play-by-play for your favorite teams and games right from your Lock Screen and Dynamic Island. Be sure to allow Live Activities in your phone Settings for CBS Sports!
- Performance improvements and bug fixes

apps.title: انتقام السلاطين
apps.description:
The legendary game Revenge of Sultans, downloaded more than 20 million times in the Middle East, is back with a brand new version!
Deeply rooted in Arabic culture and history, Revenge of Sultans is a war strategy game that offers players a familiar gaming experience combined with thrilling military conflict.
Redesigned from the ground up, Revenge of Sultans offers players a much more fair and challenging gaming platform than ever before!
Return to the battlefield and use cunning strategy to defeat powerful enemies!Are you ready to show everyone who's in charge? Enjoy the classic gameplay we all know and love in Revenge of Sultans!

[Fair Battles]
Deploy your troops to battlefields steeped in Arabic culture and history, and use clever strategies to annihilate your opponents!
New battlefields with zero casualties - troops lost during battles will instantly recover! Hero power is no longer enough to win battles - clever strategy is the key to victory!

[Exclusive Castles]
Earn tons of War Medals and Adv War Medals to upgrade your Castle with ease. During Ramadan, enjoy the dazzling Brilliant Ramadan Castle theme, use limited-time decorations, join festive events, and win lots of amazing rewards!

[Instant Upgrades]
Enhance Lv.11 and Lv.12 troops for free, instantly increasing your power! Lead your troops to battle to enjoy the thrill of intense warfare!

[Strategy & Tactics]
Deploy your troops efficiently to boost your power, and figure out the best hero and troop combinations to maximize your chance at victory. Your choices will determine the course of each and every battle!

[Kingdom War]
Forge powerful coalitions between alliances, and join forces to attack cities and occupy vast territories. Participate in epic battles between the four kingdoms, spy on your enemies, and march toward ultimate victory! A legendary clash of war strategies is about to commence!
Assemble the most powerful legions and unite the whole world under your banner!

raw_data.releaseNotes:
1. Battle Simulation
2. Beast Token Reset Optimization
3. Lord Equipment Optimization
4. Optimized Event Rewards

apps.title: Lifetime: TV Shows & Movies
apps.description:
Stream your favorite Lifetime TV shows!

Watch your favorites and discover your next binge from Lifetime’s trove of the highest quality original programming created by women for women, spanning scripted series, nonfiction series and movies. 
 
Some of Lifetime’s most popular shows include Married at First Sight, Dance Moms, Bring It!, and so much more.
 
Lifetime Movies cover many types of stories, including Ripped from the Headlines, Biopics, Thrillers, and the VC Andrews collection.
 
With the newly re-designed Lifetime app, you can:

•	 Watch full episodes and clips
•	 Catch up on entire seasons of new and classic shows
•	See exclusive clips and deleted scenes, never shown before on television
•	Create a personalized profile with Lifetime so you can continue watching episodes whenever you want, on any device
 
The Lifetime app is free to use. If your TV Provider is supported, you can sign in and get access to even more content.

This app features Nielsen’s proprietary measurement software which will allow you to contribute to market research, like Nielsen’s TV Ratings. For more information, please visit:
http://www.nielsen.com/digitalprivacy

Lifetime content is only available to stream in the United States.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
raw_data.releaseNotes: We fixed some bugs and made some updates. We hope you enjoy a better streaming experience.

apps.title: المُصممْ - اكتب على الصور
apps.description:
** التطبيق الحائز على أفضل التطبيقات العربيه لعام 2014 **

برنامج الكتابه على الصور  وبرنامج تصميم الصور مع الخطوط العربيه الأفضل مع أكثر من 20 مليون مستخدم 

كل ما يحتاجه المصمم من أدوات تساعده على تصميم الصور و الخلفيات وتصميم شعار احترافي و ملصقات 

مميزات التطبيق :

• مجموعة فلاتر الصور  مختاره لإضفاء لمسات جميله على الصور
•  ازالة الخلفية من الصور عن طريق ممحاة الخلفيه
• أضف كتابة على الصور باستخدام الخطوط العربيه و الانجليزيه الكثيره
• اقلب الصور و قم باقتصاصها بسرعة
• أضف الملصقات على الصور و صمم الملصقات الخاصة بك
• مكتبة من صور خلفيات و الرمزيات لاستخدامها لمناسباتك المفضله ( بطاقات دعوة الزواج - بطاقة دعوة المولود الجديد - بطاقة دعوة عيد ميلاد - تهاني شهر رمضان - تهاني عيد الفطر مجاني - تهاني عيد الاضحى - تهاني وتبريكات رمضانيه - تهاني وتبريكات عيد الفطر - تهاني رسائل تهنئة و معايدة اخرى )
• امكانية الرجوع لـ التصميم لاجراء التعديل والتصميم لاحقاً
•  ملصقات احترافيه عربيه واسلاميه مختاره بعنايه
•  ترتيب الطبقات مثل برنامج فوتوشوب تعديل الصور
• امكانية تصميم ملصقات واتس اب بكل سهوله مع خلفيات شفافه
•  امكانية تصميم شعار على خلفيه شفافه  او تصميم فلتر سناب او ملصقات او خلفيات 
•  مشاركة الصور و الخلفيات الى انستجرام و سناب و تيك توك و بكس ارت و واتس اب و تويتر وفيس بوك وغيرها من التطبيقات الداعمه

مميزات المصمم بلس : 

• مجموعة ملصقات خاصه وحصريه
• منع الاعلانات عن التطبيق 
• مجموعة مؤثرات على الصور و التصميم

apps.title: GSN Casino: Slot Machine Games
apps.description:

apps.title: ONE PIECE Bounty Rush
apps.description:
Take the loot you pirate! One Piece Bounty Rush is a 3D anime battle arena treasure looting game set in the popular manga pirate world of One Piece! Join Luffy, the famous Straw Hat Pirate and all your favorite characters from the One Piece universe in 4 vs 4 real-time pvp battles to rush and loot the treasure of berry coins for victory!

4 vs 4 MULTIPLAYER TREASURE LOOTING ACTION
• Exciting capture the flag-style anime pirate action
• 2 teams of 4 players battle in real-time to loot the most treasure
• Rush to grab more Berry coins to reach victory

CREATE THE ULTIMATE PIRATE CREW
• Battle rival teams using popular One Piece anime characters from Luffy to Zolo
• Mix & match characters to form the strongest treasure looting team!
• Collect Character Fragments during battle to unlock more characters!

DEEP SEA GAMEPLAY AND LEVEL UP SYSTEM
• Strategize character class selections (Attacker, Defender, Runner) to collect the most treasure
• Upgrade your character’s grade level and skills through League and Solo battles
• Equip characters with Medals to give them battle changing Traits!

EXPERIENCE THE ONE PIECE UNIVERSE
• The One Piece manga world reimagined as the battlefield in beautiful 3D
• Battle at iconic locations from the anime including the seafaring Baratie restaurant and the Alabasta desert kingdom.
• Every match comes complete with items from the One Piece universe to give your team the upper hand.

Are you pirates ready to loot some treasure? Grab your crew and join the quest to become the Pirate King in One Piece Bounty Rush!



Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc. Website:
https://bandainamcoent.co.jp/english/

By downloading or installing this app, you agree to the Bandai Namco Entertainment Terms of Service.

https://legal.bandainamcoent.co.jp/terms/

https://legal.bandainamcoent.co.jp/privacy/

apps.title: District: Movies Events Dining
apps.description:
Here's what life in your District looks like -

Movies
Book tickets at the city's best theatres and cinema screens, including PVR Inox, Cinepolis, Miraj cinemas and many more. Experience the magic of blockbuster films like Insidious 6, Hridayapoorvam, Param Sundari, War 2, Lokah Chapter One: Chandra and more. Enjoy seamless booking and immerse yourself in unforgettable storytelling.

Events
The best nights (and days) out start here. Experience the thrill of the biggest entertainment shows, from Rolling Loud, Akon's India tour to epic music festivals and concerts, like Enrique Iglesias Live in Concert, Eric Prydz, Hukum World Tour, Radhika Das India Tour and more.

Activities & Attractions
Unlock experiences at Wonderla, Imagicaa, Smaaash, Timezone and more. With exclusive access and experiences, these aren't just plans. They are core memories waiting to happen.

Dining
Find and book the best restaurants and cafes in your city, all in one place. From brunches and date nights to group dinners and after-work drinks, discover places for every plan. Book tables, pay through the app, and unlock exclusive offers. All when you book through the app.

Stores
Your favourite brands are all on the app. Discover new-season drops, curated finds, and trending picks across fashion, beauty, home and more. Explore store locations near you, shop smarter with the end-of-season sale and get exclusive rewards, only when you pay through the app. Your shopping runs just got an upgrade.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
If it’s happening in your city, it’s on your screen.

From packed theatres and unmissable gigs to late-night dinners and plans that actually stick, catch everything worth stepping out for right here.

With iOS 26, the app’s had a bit of a glow-up. Liquid Glass brings a sleeker, sharper look you’ll actually notice. You can now switch on auto-adding movie tickets to Apple Wallet, because no one likes fumbling at the door. And for supported devices, our new Ask Anything feature leverages Foundation Models to make event browsing smoother by giving you the answers you want before the night even begins.

Hit update and see what’s waiting in your District.

apps.title: World Robot Boxing
apps.description:
UNLEASH ROBOT TITANS 
Towering over 9 feet tall and weighing over 2000 pounds are your 58 ultimate fighting machines, robot titans & legends including fan favorite superstars – Zeus, Atom, Noisy boy & Twin Cities.

STAR ROBOTS
Fight the greatest robot brawlers among 100 million WRB players in exciting Global Multiplayer battles. Transform the legends Atom, Zeus, and all-time favorite champions into powerful 1, 2, 3 and 4 Star Robots to win big in Versus Leagues & Global Tournaments. Top the Leaderboards, claim the Championship title and reign supreme as the Ultimate World Robot Boxing Champion.

Achieve greatness in the future of boxing, where gigantic robots pack powerful punches. Unleash your fighting style with deadly jabs, uppercuts & special moves to win world championship belts, collect trophies & knockout friends!

BRAWL REAL-TIME WITH FRIENDS 
Unleash your true self in live local Wi-Fi & Bluetooth multiplayer and earn bragging rights while enjoying the winning moment!

WIN EXCITING CHALLENGES!
Play Career, Multiplayer, and the new Winner Take All Mode to become the All-Category Champion.

EXPERIENCE REAL SPORTS ACTION
Build a roster of your favorite sports robots and take on the Legends in enthralling arenas and stadiums.

UPGRADE & COLOR YOUR CHAMPION
Fight and Upgrade your robot to be stronger, faster and meaner. Color your robot, express yourself and have some fun in the Paint shop!

SHOWCASE YOUR TRIUMPHS
Win Challenges and exhibit your achievements in an all-new Trophy Room.

ACHIEVE GLORY IN ARENAS
Reign supreme in 11 huge arenas that can barely contain these hulking mean machines.

World Robot Boxing Subscription Service offers some exclusive benefits to its members.
1. Metro's Stockpile Subscription available at $9.99/month offers:
70 Gold Immediately
14 Gold Daily
300 VIP Points
2. Midas's Fortune Subscription available at $4.99/month offers:
30 Gold Immediately
6 Gold Daily
150 VIP Points
The Subscription is available as a monthly purchase at $4.99 or $9.99/month. Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account starting at the initial confirmation of the Subscription purchase. Your Subscription will automatically renew 24-hours before the end of the current payment period. Manage Subscription auto-renewal via iTunes Account Settings. No cancellation of the current Subscription is allowed during the active subscription period. Cancellation will take effect at the start of the next subscription period.

JOIN THE ELITE CLUB OF World Robot Boxing FANS
Enjoy regular news on game updates, robots, features, views, video tips and more for Free
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/RealSteelWorldRobotBoxing
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/realsteelgames/
Capture player moments on Instagram: https://instagram.com/realsteelgames/
Terms & Conditions : https://www.reliancegames.com/terms-conditions/
Privacy Policy - https://www.reliancegames.com/privacy-policy/
Terms of Use (EULA) - https://www.reliancegames.com/eula/

raw_data.sellerName: RELIANCE ENTERTAINMENT STUDIOS UK PVT LIMITED
raw_data.releaseNotes:
"There’s a surge in the ring... and it’s called GrimVolt!
 A new force storms into World Robot Boxing, born from rogue science and raw energy. This isn’t just another robot, GrimVolt is the one every contender will fear, and every champion will want on their side. 
 System Uplink:
 – Meet GrimVolt: Forged in a lab that twisted the rules of power, GrimVolt crackles with fire and voltage, ready to shock the arena and rewrite the rankings.
 – Streak O Treats: Earn daily rewards as you charge toward a Grand Treat that’ll leave your rivals short‑circuited!
 – Halloween Challenges: Limited‑time events fused with chilling surprises. The stronger you fight, the hotter the rewards.
 – Iron Trials: A brutal boss mode with only 3 tries. Fail, and you lose your shot at glory.
 – Bug Fixes: Cleaner and smoother gameplay for every hit. 
 Don’t wait, unlock GrimVolt and wreck havoc in the ring. Update now!"

apps.title: Hello Kitty Island Adventure
apps.description:
Embark on a cozy adventure with Hello Kitty and Friends and restore an abandoned island to its former glory. Can you solve the mystery hidden within?

OPEN WORLD ADVENTURE
Welcome to Big Adventures Park, where friendships are key and adventure is just around the corner! Join your supercute new friends in a gorgeous world teeming with adorable creatures, delicious food, and many mysteries to explore.

HELLO KITTY AND FRIENDS
Get to know supercute and friendly faces like Hello Kitty, Kuromi, Cinnamoroll, and more by discovering their likes, questing alongside them, and eventually becoming best friends. Craft rare items, solve ancient puzzles, and decorate cabins to bring new visitors and create your ultimate island paradise. 

TONS OF FEATURES
- Run, climb, and glide around a mysterious island
- Become besties with Hello Kitty and Friends
- Dive deep to explore a magical underwater world
- Cook delicious dishes and craft useful tools
- Create your own customized Hello Kitty and Friends-style avatar
- Decorate cabins to attract Hello Kitty and Friends and their family members too
- Discover the greatest gifts to give each friend
- Collect and dye clothes to create a custom wardrobe
- Solve exciting puzzles and mysterious ruins
- Catch tons of fish and critters
- Snap some selfies with gudetama
- Put pineapple on a pizza
- Become a mermaid (yes, really)
- And SO much more

UPDATES & MORE
Experience new events, new friends, and more to explore with consistent game updates.

WEBSITE: www.hellokittyislandadventure.com
DISCORD: https://discord.gg/hellokittyislandadventure 

© 2025 SANRIO CO., LTD. Used Under License.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Interlude of Dreams
Captain Badtz-maru is waiting on the bridge for you, ensign! Join your crew and head to space for this science fiction themed event! Choose the color of your uniform carefully, turn your Cabins into spacecraft, and have fun with your friends.

Days of Plenty
The Days of Plenty are here, and Keroppi has a fairy tale to tell. Celebrate with woodland furniture and be sure to get into costume for storytime with your friends.

apps.title: Gishort - Short Dramas & Reels
apps.description:
‌Welcome to Gishort – where short clips reign supreme. This is your ultimate destination for bite-sized vertical entertainment.‌ Immerse yourself in a kaleidoscope of emotions, cultures, and creativity through thousands of exclusive original stories. Every swipe unlocks new genres, from gut-wrenching micro-dramas to laugh-out-loud global comedies, all crafted for your screen. 

Immerse yourself in a world where short videos transcend screens and ignite emotions. Gishort delivers bite-sized vertical stories designed for seamless, one-handed viewing—perfect for commutes, breaks, or anytime you crave a cinematic escape. Dive into a kaleidoscope of genres, cultures, and emotions, all condensed into 60-second masterpieces.

‌Why Choose Gishort?‌
‌Diverse Genres, One Swipe Away‌
From heart-fluttering romance to edge-of-your-seat thrillers, explore stories crafted for every mood. Our library spans cultures and emotions, offering gut-wrenching dramas, laugh-out-loud comedies, and thought-provoking narratives—all in vertical frames that fit your screen and lifestyle.

‌Exclusive Originals, Unmatched Creativity‌
Discover content you won’t find anywhere else. Gishort collaborates with global creators to produce award-worthy micro-stories, blending fresh perspectives with cinematic quality. Every clip is a testament to storytelling at its most potent and concise.

‌Feel Every Beat‌
Let emotions drive your journey. Whether you crave tears, suspense, or joy, our curated collections take you on a rollercoaster ride—where a single swipe can shift from laughter to awe, leaving you captivated long after the screen fades.

‌Your Rules, Your Rhythm‌
Tailor the experience to your taste. Adjust playback speed, build personalized watchlists, and explore hidden gems through smart recommendations that learn your preferences. Gishort adapts to you, ensuring every session feels uniquely yours.

‌Watch Anywhere, Own Every Moment‌
Life moves fast—your entertainment keeps pace. Stream high-quality vertical stories instantly during coffee breaks, workouts, or late-night wind-downs. No downloads, no rotations—just pure, on-the-go immersion.

‌Fresh Stories, Endless Discovery‌
Our library grows with you. Regular updates bring new genres, rising creators, and viral trends straight to your feed, ensuring boredom never gets a seat at your screen.

‌Short Clips, Big Vibes‌
Gishort isn’t just an app—it’s a passport to a universe where seconds spark lasting connections. Join a global community redefining how stories are told and felt.

‌Download Gishort now and turn every moment into a story worth sharing. Short Clips, Big Vibes – your screen is waiting.

apps.title: LEGOLAND California - Official
apps.description:
Ahoy there! Captain Brickbeard here. Aaarrrrgh you ready to build the perfect day at LEGOLAND® California Resort? The app you’re about to download be every Pirate’s treasure trove when it comes to adventures at LEGOLAND California Resort. You’ll be able to:

• Take a peek at wait times

• Navigate through the Park

• Set reminders so you don’t miss your favorite shows

• Store your tickets, passes and extras in our brand new app ticket wallet for quick and easy entry

• Use our Planner tool to get all the information you need for your visit before you’ve even arrived. Tell the app who is in your party to see which rides are suitable for everyone. Then add your favourites and check them off as you go! 

• Get access to insider tips that only be available to our most adventurous sailors

Best of all, an ancient sea legend foretold that this update would give you access to amazing discounts 'n insider tips... blimey! That be just a rumor though. You’ll have to download for yourself and see! Avast Ye! Haul up the sails and get your crew to LEGOLAND. See you on the high seas soon, mateys!

The app uses your location to keep you up to date with offers, events and activities relevant to your location.

apps.title: Bingo Stars - Win Real Money
apps.description:
Bingo Stars™ is the ultimate bingo game where fast, fair, fun gameplay and real cash prizes meet. Play bingo in a world of high-paced fun, and test your skills in tournaments 24/7 for endless cash prizes.

Download and play the game for FREE! 

Compete in tournaments and WIN REAL MONEY.

If you like Blackout, Story, Bash, Clash, Holiday, Tycoon, Pop, Showdown, Blitz, or Bingo Cash – you'll LOVE Bingo Stars™!

You’re matched with players of similar skill level to keep the gameplay 100% fast, fair, and fun!

Top players win cash and prizes instantly!

How to Play:
- Match and mark the numbers that are called
- Get a BINGO by filling 5 squares in a row in any direction or filling the 4 corners of your card.
- You can score multiple BINGOs and multiply your score
- Tap BINGO to record your BINGOs
- Get BOOSTERS by tapping your squares faster. Use your BOOSTERS for added bonuses on your card.
- Score as many points as possible in under 3 minutes.
- As soon as all players in your match finish, reveal the tournament to see if you won the top prize!
- Stack your cash and play in even bigger and better tournaments for a chance to win huge cash prizes!
- And get ready to shout BINGO!

Enjoy Our New Exciting Gameplay:
- Win real money tournaments
- Secure deposit using PayPal, Credit Card or Apple Pay.
- Fast and Secure cash-out with PayPal
- Enter multiplayer tournaments with rewards and cash prizes 24/7
- Satisfy your need for fast-paced bingo with immersive gameplay
- New challenges happen daily
- And many more!

Bingo Stars™ is FREE to download and play. Please note that cash tournaments are not available in the following states: Arizona, Louisiana, and South Carolina. 

DOWNLOAD NOW AND GET PAID TO PLAY!
Need help? Contact our Support Team at support@luckyday.com.

Don't miss out on the chance to become the ultimate Bingo Star and win big. Play Bingo Stars™ today!

apps.title: MYLE - Events Curated For You
apps.description:
MYLE is the ultimate event and smart entertainment guide designed to Make Your Life Entertaining, right from the palm of your hand. Quickly find nearby events to hear live music, take the kids out, dine and drink responsibly with friends, catch a show, and more — available WORLDWIDE. Traveling or looking to discover new places nearby? Get the MYLE app today and Just MYLE It!

Promoters, Event Planners, and Venue Owners - Add your event NOW for free!

MYLE App Features:
- Explore Events By Category, Location, Map View, Host & more filters
- Discover perfectly curated events tailored just for you
- Select Rideshare options for transportation ease
- Search for any event, any time, any place
- Worldwide availability
- Like, Love or Lose events and curate your experiences
- RSVP for events you plan to attend with one tap
- Calendarize and Share events with friends or on social
- Follow the event host and be the first to be notified of their events
- Post your event or list your venue for Free
- Indulge in the MYLE community by sharing comments with other event-goers or creators
- Safe, secure, and free
- Select notification preferences and stay abreast of cool events near you
- Get more traffic to your venue or event using our MYLE Mogul membership for less than $2/day

What type of events does MYLE have?
Pretty much everything... But here are a few to start:
- Food & Bar
- Festivals & Fairs
- Comedy
- Nightlife And Social
- Networking and Meetups
- Family Fun
- Business
- Health & Beauty
- Sports
- Live Music
- Theater & Performance
- Charity & Community
- Science & Tech
- Arts & Culture
- Lifestyle
- Outdoor
- Travel & Tours
- Virtual/Online
- AND MORE

Why chose MYLE?
MYLE is making the biggest moves in the smart entertainment and lives event creator industry in order to dominate the market with specialty curated events. No more searching, scrolling, or missing out on cool events...When looking for Things to do, Places to go, and Food to eat, Just MYLE It!

Have questions? Ask away. Click the support URL below.

Terms & Condition: https://myle.com/terms
Privacy Policy: https://myle.com/privacy

Like MYLE? Feel free to give us a review :)

#MYLE #MakeYourLifeEntertaining #JUSTMYLEIT

Please be sure to provide us with a rating in the App Store and share it with friends and family.

When looking for Things to do, Places to Go and Food to Eat, #justMYLEit

apps.title: كلمات كراش : لعبة تسلية وتحدي
apps.description:
امنح نفسك التسلية والمتعة مع أكثر من 1500 مرحلة رهيبة وتصميم عالمي.. فقط حمل اللعبة وحل المراحل الاولى ولن تتوقف!.. 


بدون منازع أفضل لعبة كلمات عربية شاملة وبجودة عالية من زيتونة.
لعبة تجمع افراد العائلة والاصدقاء بجو من التحدي والتعاون.

تنوع في المراحل, سيملأ وقتك بالتسلية والفائدة والابتسامة عند كل مرحلة.
تسلية تشويق ومنافسة

استكشف خارطة العالم العربي عن طريق حل المراحل المتنوعة والشيقة,
وتسابق مع اصدقاءك في الفيسبوك 
لعبة تسلية ذهنية وجماعية, بحث, تفكير, حدة, ومنافسة بين الاصدقاء وافراد العائلة
تشمل مئات المراحل, بانواع مختلفة, 
- اكشف المثل,
- وراء الصورة
- كلمة السر
- وصلة
- لعبة الكنز

لعبة تحتاج لذكاء وحس فكاهي في نفس الوقت, كل من حمل اللعبة أحبها.

اضافة تحدي يومي, مشترك بين كل اللاعبين في العالم العربي
نراك في اللعبة
العاب زيتونة

apps.title: DRAGON BALL Z DOKKAN BATTLE
apps.description:
DRAGON BALL Z DOKKAN BATTLE is the one of the best DRAGON BALL mobile game experiences available. This DB anime action puzzle game features beautiful 2D illustrated visuals and animations set in a DRAGON BALL world where the timeline has been thrown into chaos, where DB characters from the past and present come face to face in new and exciting battles! Experience the new story and save the world of DRAGON BALL!

DRAGON BALL Z DOKKAN BATTLE features a super refreshing and simplistic approach to the anime action genre! The epic anime-like battles feature simple yet addictive gameplay. Link Ki spheres during battle to attack your foes! Take your time and play at your own pace, it’s the perfect DB game to play on the go wherever you are! When you are ready and powered up, finish your enemies with powerful Super Attacks such as Super Saiyan Goku’s Kamehameha and many more to send enemies flying!

All of your favorite characters are here from all your favorite DRAGON BALL anime series! From DBZ to DBS, everyone’s favorite Saiyan, Goku and his friends are ready to battle Frieza, Cell, Beerus, Jiren, and more! Summon your favorite DB characters and create the ultimate dream team(s)! Train and Awaken DB characters to power them up!

Help return order to the DRAGON BALL timeline through Quest mode. Experience reimagined popular anime stories with DB characters new and old. Play in Dokkan Events and the World Tournament and face off against tough enemies! And for true hardened fighters, the challenges of Extreme Z-Battle and Super Battle Road await!

SIMPLE ADDICTING GAMEPLAY
• Featuring a new take on the action puzzle game genre
• Tap and link Ki Spheres to attack and enter Dokkan Mode to finish foes!!
• Play at your own pace, planning your battle strategy is key

FINISH FOES WITH SUPER ATTACKS
• Collect enough Ki Spheres to activate Super Attacks just like the anime
• From Goku’s Iconic Kamehameha attack to Vegeta’s Final Flash, all your favorites are here
• Experience them all in epic 2D illustrations and animations

YOUR FAVORITE DRAGON BALL CHARACTERS ARE HERE
• From DBZ to DBS, many popular DB characters are available
• Summon new and classic favorites such as Super - Saiyan God SS Goku, Vegeta, Krillin or rivals such as Frieza, Cell, Beerus, and Jiren plus more from the popular anime series

FORM YOUR TEAM OF POWERFUL WARRIORS
• Organize your DRAGON BALL team and create the strongest fighting force!
• Train your favorite DB characters and Awaken them to new realms of power!

A NEW DRAGON BALL STORY
• Bring order to the DRAGON BALL timeline
• Play the board game-style map and all-new story with your favorite Dragon Ball characters!
• Experience reimagined stories with DB characters new and old
Are you ready to go even further beyond? Download one of the best DRAGON BALL experiences available with DRAGON BALL Z DOKKAN BATTLE today for free!

Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc. Website:
https://bandainamcoent.co.jp/english/
By downloading or installing this app, you agree to the Bandai Namco Entertainment Terms of Service.

Terms of Service:
https://legal.bandainamcoent.co.jp/terms/
Privacy Policy:
https://legal.bandainamcoent.co.jp/privacy/

Note:
This game contains some items available for in-app purchase
that can enhance gameplay and speed up your progress. In-app
purchases can be disabled in your device settings, see
https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT201304 for more details.

[Note About “Family Sharing”]
This application currently does not support the “Ask to Buy” feature included with Family Sharing. As a result, using this feature to make an in-app purchase on a device with Family Sharing enabled may result in an error. We ask that you do not use the “Ask to Buy” feature when purchasing items until we have updated our application to support this feature.

This application is distributed under the official rights from the license holder.

Powered by "CRIWARE".
CRIWARE is a trademark of CRI Middleware Co., Ltd.

apps.title: Goof Off
apps.description:
Designed specifically for Apple Watch, a must-have, compatible with all platforms.
Play a variety of classic mini-games in one app.
Play anytime, anywhere: at work, school, in a meeting, on the subway, on the toilet, on a plane, or even when you're offline.

Games launched:
Klotski
Tetris
Tetris·Fall
Greed Snake
Minesweeper
Sudoku
Math 24
Find The Heads Of Planes 
E-books (macOS)

The design is fresh and concise, and the gameplay is simple.
Multiple difficulty levels, suitable for players of different levels.
Not only it can bring you joy, but it can also challenge your intelligence and reflexes.

Each game can be purchased at one time and used on multiple devices, iPhone, Watch, and Mac!

The macOS client is even more modeled after the Numbers style. When playing or reading e-books at work, the boss will never find out!

Come and download it and enjoy the fun of the game together!

Privacy Policy: https://antonhomebrew.github.io/page/goofoff/privacy_policy.html
Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

apps.title: FarmVille 2: Tropic Escape
apps.description:
Escape to an island getaway filled with adventure, mystery, and fun new mini games from the makers of FarmVille, the number one farming franchise! Play this colorful free-to-play game, now available for iPhone, iPad, and iMessage app.
 
 Build your very own beachside inn complete with island workshops, tropical crops, and exotic animals. Farm island fruits like pineapples, coconuts, and mangos to delight your guests. Craft delicious recipes and rare goods like piña coladas, grilled fish, and flower leis. 
 
 Catch fish with Capri the dolphin and explore with Odney the playful monkey! Feed tasty treats to the cute, playful animals on your island to get unique photo ops for your guests. Story-based quests help you explore uncharted areas, learn more about your island and find rare items and goods. 
 
 Adventure unfolds all around your island! 
 
 ESCAPE TO THE TROPICS 
 - Seek adventures on your very own tropical island 
 - Farm unique fruits and veggies, craft fun drinks and meet adorable animals 
 - Discover all of the tropical crops and exotic animals that call your island home 
 - Run a beachside inn and start a new life in paradise 
 - Play mini games and have fun with new characters like Ting 
 
 UNCOVER MYSTERY, SECRETS AND TREASURES 
 - Complete story-based quests with island guides like the archaeologist and surfing expert 
 - Explore the bubbling volcano and ancient monkey temple 
 - Discover hidden treasures and rare goods in the secret chamber 
 - Investigate uncharted areas to find even more island secrets 
 
 BUILD AMENITIES FOR YOUR GUESTS 
 - Fix up island workshops and create your own personal paradise 
 - Buy a Tiki Bar, Sushi Stand, Artisan Workshop and more 
 - Expand your inn and hire guides to help your guests enjoy the island 
 
 DISCOVER AND PHOTOGRAPH ADORABLE ANIMALS FOR REWARDS 
 - Build a Wildlife Center on your island with the help of Ting, the wildlife guide
 - Attract rare and exotic animals to your island like the colorful Iguana by feeding them treats 
 - Earn rewards by snapping photos of the animals as souvenirs for your guests 
 
 TRADE WITH OTHER ISLANDS 
 - Trade with other players using the trade boat 
 - Short on eggs? Buy the goods you need from neighboring islands 
 - Have too many pineapples? Name your price and sell off extra crops and crafts 
 - The more coins you have, the more you can do on your island 
 
 Escape to a shimmering world of sunshine, adventure and fun in FarmVille: Tropic Escape! Download today and start building your island paradise! 
 
 ADDITIONAL DISCLOSURES
 • For specific information about how Zynga collects and uses personal or other data, please read our privacy policy at https://www.take2games.com/privacy.
• This game does permit a user to connect to social networks, such as Facebook, and as such players may come into contact with other people when playing this game. Social Networking Service terms may also apply.

raw_data.description:
Escape to an island getaway filled with adventure, mystery, and fun new mini games from the makers of FarmVille, the number one farming franchise! Play this colorful free-to-play game, now available for iPhone, iPad, and iMessage app.
 
 Build your very own beachside inn complete with island workshops, tropical crops, and exotic animals. Farm island fruits like pineapples, coconuts, and mangos to delight your guests. Craft delicious recipes and rare goods like piña coladas, grilled fish, and flower leis. 
 
 Catch fish with Capri the dolphin and explore with Odney the playful monkey! Feed tasty treats to the cute, playful animals on your island to get unique photo ops for your guests. Story-based quests help you explore uncharted areas, learn more about your island and find rare items and goods. 
 
 Adventure unfolds all around your island! 
 
 ESCAPE TO THE TROPICS 
 - Seek adventures on your very own tropical island 
 - Farm unique fruits and veggies, craft fun drinks and meet adorable animals 
 - Discover all of the tropical crops and exotic animals that call your island home 
 - Run a beachside inn and start a new life in paradise 
 - Play mini games and have fun with new characters like Ting 
 
 UNCOVER MYSTERY, SECRETS AND TREASURES 
 - Complete story-based quests with island guides like the archaeologist and surfing expert 
 - Explore the bubbling volcano and ancient monkey temple 
 - Discover hidden treasures and rare goods in the secret chamber 
 - Investigate uncharted areas to find even more island secrets 
 
 BUILD AMENITIES FOR YOUR GUESTS 
 - Fix up island workshops and create your own personal paradise 
 - Buy a Tiki Bar, Sushi Stand, Artisan Workshop and more 
 - Expand your inn and hire guides to help your guests enjoy the island 
 
 DISCOVER AND PHOTOGRAPH ADORABLE ANIMALS FOR REWARDS 
 - Build a Wildlife Center on your island with the help of Ting, the wildlife guide
 - Attract rare and exotic animals to your island like the colorful Iguana by feeding them treats 
 - Earn rewards by snapping photos of the animals as souvenirs for your guests 
 
 TRADE WITH OTHER ISLANDS 
 - Trade with other players using the trade boat 
 - Short on eggs? Buy the goods you need from neighboring islands 
 - Have too many pineapples? Name your price and sell off extra crops and crafts 
 - The more coins you have, the more you can do on your island 
 
 Escape to a shimmering world of sunshine, adventure and fun in FarmVille: Tropic Escape! Download today and start building your island paradise! 
 
 ADDITIONAL DISCLOSURES

Welcome to ALTT – the ultimate app and OTT platform India, where storytelling meets convenience. Whether you're into short videos, one minute episodes, or binge-worthy Hindi web series, ALTT brings a world of limitless stories right to your screen.
 
ALTT delivers the best in desi web series, romantic web series, and original Indian shows. From gripping thrillers to emotional tales like Broken But Beautiful, you'll find content for every mood. Enjoy short dramas, mini video app formats, reel short content, and trending shows — all in immersive vertical videos.
 
Download now to explore a myriad of short dramas and discover why ALTT is the go-to Reels App for good short video lovers.
 
Enjoy Free Streaming on ALTT – Your Go-To short format video Platform Kutingg App:
• Stream short dramas, short videos, and one minute episodes for free
• Explore vertical videos and reel short content from the best mini video app
• Perfect for users who love good short video entertainment on the go
 
Subscribe to Unlock Premium on ALTT (by Alt Balaji):
• Access 150+ exclusive Hindi web series, desi web series, and romantic web series
• Dive into 3000+ hours of limitless stories and original Indian shows
• Enjoy ad-free HD streaming* and offline downloads
• Stream seamlessly across devices on India’s top OTT platform India
 
ALTT subscription service starts from ₹99* (weekly) , ₹179* (1 month) , ₹299* (Quarterly) , ₹549* (Yearly) & Premium Yearly is at ₹699* (Ads-free)
 
Trending Now:
Pavitra Rishta Season 2 – Watch Pavitra Rishta Season 2 online at ALTT App. Pavitra Rishta Season 2 sees Manav and Archana’s story over the span of years from their separation. Despite of being misfits in their world, how they manage to find their footing in the real world is interesting to watch. Let’s unravel the story of love in each episode.
 
Badtameez Dil Season 1 – Starring Shivam Bhaargava,Mallika Dua,Minissha Lamba,Barun Sobti,Ridhi Dogra With London as the backdrop, Badtameez is a story about Himmat, aka Lizzy, a hopeless romantic who believes in the one, and Karan, who is her complete opposite and believes that emotional and sexual relationships should be kept different
 
Kaal Nagari – Haunted detective and fearless journalist expose Kaal Nagri's deadly secrets.... stay tuned to find more in this vertical video experience.
 
Crimes and Confessions Season 2 – Starring Navina Bole,Sherlyn Chopra,Rumi Hande,Sahil Sambhyal.An anthology series about love, greed, longing, jealousy, gender politics that are set amidst backdrops of different eras. Every episode will leave you on the edge of your seat as you unravel the darkest crime and deepest confessions in the series.
 
Kutingg app redefining digital storytelling with limitless stories, bite-sized drama, and the best of India’s short video content landscape.

apps.title: Diablo Immortal
apps.description:
UPDATE - NEW CHARACTER CLASS
Unleash the beast with a new character class! Play as a Druid, a legendary shapeshifting guardian, where you can wield elemental forces and transform into an all-powerful werebear or werewolf.

SLAY YOUR WAY WITH ENDLESS CUSTOMIZATION

Choose from 9 iconic classes and build your legend as a Barbarian, Blood Knight, Crusader, Demon Hunter, Druid, Monk, Necromancer, Tempest, or a Wizard.

Customize your hero’s appearance, abilities, and gear. Whether you favor up-close brutality or ranged precision, Diablo Immortal adapts to your playstyle.

THE BATTLE BEGINS HERE
Descend into darkness as the once peaceful world of Sanctuary has been torn apart by the Eternal Conflict between angels and demons. It needs a hero. It needs YOU. 

Diablo Immortal, the definitive mobile MMORPG in the Diablo saga, casts you as humanity's last hope against impending chaos and evil.

Step into the armor of a battle-hardened warrior and experience exceptional action RPG gameplay on your phone or tablet, anytime, anywhere. Diablo Immortal offers epic quests, thrilling battles, and a compelling dark fantasy narrative — all the while delivering nonstop combat, deep progression, and endless ways to play.

Assemble your allies and embark on your journey of destiny now.

EVER-EVOLVING ACTION RPG COMBAT
Designed and expanded for mobile, Diablo Immortal delivers visceral combat with tight controls and precision. Engage in real-time battles across solo and multiplayer modes.

●     Responsive movement and attacks
●     Fluid combat optimized for touch or controller
●     Raid bosses, clear dungeons, or dive into PvP

A LIVING SANCTUARY
Sanctuary is not a static world — it evolves, breathes, and attacks at any given moment. Discover haunted ruins, twisted forests, and lost civilizations through constantly updated content and dynamic Zone Events.

●     Massive world bosses and seasonal challenges
●     Rich environmental storytelling inspired by Diablo lore
●     New settings like the ancient forests of the Sharval Wilds

THE POWER OF COMMUNITY
Alone or with others, Diablo Immortal offers a true MMORPG experience. Join forces, trade, fight, and ascend with players from around the world.

●     Create Warbands for small-group synergy
●     Join Clans to dominate leaderboards and unlock shared benefits
●     Cooperate in raids, defend your territory, or test your skill in PvP arenas


CORE FEATURES
●     True Action RPG Combat – Experience visceral ARPG gameplay with fluid, real-time PvP and co-op battles.
●     Massive Open-World MMORPG – Explore shared zones, complete events, and encounter other players in a living Sanctuary.
●     Build and Optimize Your Hero – Deeply customize your hero from 9 classes through gear, skills, and playstyle, driven by loot-based progression.
●     Multiplayer Raids and PvP Arenas – Participate in multiplayer raids for challenging dungeon runs and test your abilities in structured PvP arenas.

FORGED BY FIRE
Diablo Immortal is more than a mobile game — it’s a continuation of a saga that has captivated players for years. With AAA quality, expansive lore, and ever-evolving gameplay, this is Diablo as you’ve never experienced it before.

The war for Sanctuary has begun. Download now and become a legend.

IN-GAME PURCHASES (INCLUDES RANDOM ITEMS)
©2025 BLIZZARD ENTERTAINMENT, INC. AND NETEASE, INC. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.
DIABLO IMMORTAL, DIABLO, BATTLE.NET, THE BATTLE.NET LOGO, AND BLIZZARD ENTERTAINMENT ARE TRADEMARKS OR REGISTERED TRADEMARKS OF BLIZZARD ENTERTAINMENT, INC.

Reap rewards during the Festival of the Harvest Moon, live 10/1

apps.title: CATCHPLAY+
apps.description:
[IMAGINE HAVING YOUR OWN PRIVATE THEATER 24 HOURS A DAY?]
Our weekly updated library gives you a vast selection of videos to watch from the latest blockbusters to art house films, anytime, anywhere.
Missed a popular movie in theaters? Catch it on CATCHPLAY+! Discover hundreds of hidden gem movies that you'll love, all within our vast content library.



[DON’T KNOW WHAT TO WATCH? WE WILL HELP YOU FIND ONE FROM OUR VAST LIBRARY CONTENT]
Discover endless movie recommendations and enjoy worry-free viewing, knowing you'll always have something great to watch.Our editor’s notes and recommendations, IMDb rating, intuitive search functions, and more than 400 genres, we just make searching for the movies or series you love so much easier, so much fun and so much satisfying. 



[STORIES BEHIND THE SCENES]
Can’t get enough with just watching movies and series? Want to find out more interesting details about the videos? The latest news, inside stories, directors, casts & crews – it’s all here at CATCHPLAY+ !



[NON-STOP EXPERIENCE, ANYTIME, ANYWHERE]
Enjoy watching your favorite content non-stop everywhere every time. Switching from one device to another without losing your watching history. Login into 5 devices and stream concurrently from 2 devices. You can choose whether to pause, play or stop a video , when and where you want to continue at your fingertip . Yes, it’s that simple.



[YOU HAVE WHAT YOU LOVE]
We will bring out the most relevant content and information based on your preference direct to you. You have what you love, it’s as simple as that!




If you like our APP, please give us a 5-star rating! 
Any questions, please don’t hesitate to contact us: support@catchplay.com 



• Terms of use: https://www.catchplay.com/tw-en/info/legal-agreement
• Privacy policy: https://www.catchplay.com/tw-en/info/privacy-policy

apps.title: Angry Birds POP!
apps.description:
Let the bubbles fly in a charming bubble shooter downloaded by more than 45 
MILLION players! Match and pop colorful bubbles in over 10,000 captivating level 
games, and participate in special events to earn awesome rewards! Have lots of 
fun playing this bubble shooter game!
 
Join Stella, Red, Chuck, Bomb, and the rest of the Angry Birds flock in a bubble 
shooting adventure bursting with a nearly endless supply of challenges! Grab 
your trusty slingshot and shoot those bubbles to drop the pigs and rescue the 
impossibly adorable Hatchlings. With special guests and events popping up all the
time, there’s always a fun new challenge to take on. Of course accomplishments 
come with their fair share of rewards! One of a kind bubble pop games!

FEATURES:
– Over 10,000 levels! New levels added every week.
– Tons of bubble popping puzzles to solve, from simple to difficult.
– Easy to pick up and play anytime!
– Shoot matching bubbles to pop them.
– Bounce bubbles to pull off precise bank shots.
– Earn high scores and 3 stars in every level!
– Figure out the best way to solve every level – tap into your creativity!
– Intuitive controls – tap, slingshot, or point to shoot with precision.
– Play fun, limited-time events for the best rewards.
– Save cute animals and take on a variety of game modes!
– Defeat enemies with the slingshot – those piggies have met their match!
– Fun and colorful graphics and animations.
– Challenge your friends for the best scores and most stars.
– Simple bubble-popping fun for adults and kids alike! Or adults who want to be kids. Also kids who want to be adults. It’s basically fun for everyone!


-----------------------------

We may update the game periodically, for example to add new features or content or to fix bugs or other technical issues. Please note that the game may not function properly if you do not have the newest version installed. If you have not installed the latest update, Rovio will not be responsible for the game failing to function as expected.

Need some help? Visit our support pages, or send a message to the stars on our support team! https://support.rovio.com/
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/angrybirdspop/

-----------------------------

Angry Birds Pop! - Bubble Shooter is completely free to play, but there are optional in-app purchases available. Either way, it’s tons of fun!

Terms of Use: https://www.rovio.com/terms-of-service
Privacy Policy: https://www.rovio.com/privacy

apps.title: eSET
apps.description:
eSET is the most efficient way to learn the language of live entertainment technology, to understand and to be understood. With over 2000 terms associated with the industry, eSET will guide you to the information you need to know. Covering virtually every discipline within live entertainment technology, eSET was developed by industry leaders to help build a skilled and knowledgeable workforce for the future of the industry.

eSET provides the user with a searchable database, organized by discipline, that helps you direct your learning, covering what you have to know today and need to know tomorrow. The database will be continually updated. See sample terms and download assessments and discipline-specific PDF’s at our website: http://www.eset.net/terms/index.php

 eSET: Ready for today, prepared for tomorrow
